1b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rang na me g+ha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon
1b2: mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
1b3: 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ga yA na ga yA'i mgo'i ri li dge slong bdun khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun
1b5: chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/
1b6: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa
1b7: glang po chen po/ / bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs
1b8: su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son
2a1: pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/ chos kyi rgyal ba'ams/ sems rnyed pa dang / bkur ba ste thams cad dang bral ba/ legs par rab byung ba/ legs par bsten par rdzogs pa/ bdag pa yongs
2a2: su rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa sha sta ga ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'
2a3: tshogs chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'phag
2a4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin du gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa/ sgrib
2a5: pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas
2a6: 5/ stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon las la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa/ ye shes
2a7: mtha'angs pa/ sems rnamapa' dang sang+yas pa/ sems rgyas k+tar na pa/ sems rgyal po nga ltar maskal pa/ sems pa so lta mags pa/ sems de la yang shi da ngas gradagapa/
2a8: bse nga zhin du yongs su byung rnams pa di nyi ste/ byang chubs mas dpa sems dpa chen po ri po med pa la dang / lag rdo rje na po dang / lagan byas can po dang / pa cod pa dang / ga
2b1: rin po che dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang / ran paza'i steng pa dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / dge ba
2b2: snying po dang dge badri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / ye shes kyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / ting nga 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i tha ba dang / kun dug pa dang / spyan
2b3: ras gzigs dbang po dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas mig dang / pad ma'i mig dang / drim med pa'i mig dang / yangs pa'i mig dang / kun du spyod lam dang / kun du mdzes pa dang / kun du spyod pa'i tha
2b4: gros dang / ye shos kyi blo gros dang / mos kyi bro gros dang / rgyal po'i blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdorje'i bro gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / seng ge rnam par rol ba dang / sgra chen po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / seng
2b5: ge'i sgra sgrogs dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrogs dang / gos med dang / drim kun bral dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ya shes kyi 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal
2b6: dang / pad ma'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b7: dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin du gnod bral
2b8: lo sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu kun du dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin du 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang
3a1: byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi tha rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i buthams cad dang / lnga'i
3a2: bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po zags zangs ris dang / stobs can dang / nor sbyin dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / klu
3a3: rgyal po ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma dang / klu'i bu mo mang po
3a4: rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dang yang babs gcig go// yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i ri'i dpag
3a5: tshad bzhi khor khor yug du skra'i rtse mo'i che shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis mags
3a6: par gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam/ bar snang gi phyogs de med do// 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'azang du dpag tshad gcig/ 'khor khor yug tu dpag tshad byed pa la lha'i gdan brgya
3a7: stong du ma ni bting / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas ni bla re bres/ dar gyi lnga ldi brgya stong du ma ni spyangs/ me tog sil mas ni gtor ba zhig bshams te/ seng ge'i khri de'i 'khor khor yug gi ma'i phyogs de'i dngos rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag
3a8: mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du ma gtor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i rtser phyogs de na
3b1: gser gyi pad ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/ 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa/ chu ba ni be dUr+ya/ snying po ni in dra nI la/ ze ba ni a sma gar b+ha ste/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to//
3b2: seng ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhir ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing sring du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis/ sboms su rgyad grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so// seng ge'i khri legs par bshams pa
3b3: de la bcom ldan 'das blon rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni mgos la/ mi bsnyengs shing mi 'dzem ste/ seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa/
3b4: mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyeg pa med cing shin du rnam par dang ba/ rgya mtsho ltar zab cing gting dpag dka' la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/
3b5: klu chen po ltar chos kyi char pa mngon par 'bebs pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/ slob ma shin du dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
3b6: rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khri ka brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs mdud par bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa de na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba'i dpa'i
3b7: gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa byung ste/ de byung bso phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/ byer
3b8: 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am btsums par yang mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla
4a1: ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi shes paphye ba 'am/ btsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer de dgazhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo
4a2: phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon no/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ bye ma'i phung po la mar ram 'bru mar ram/ chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba 'am btsums par mi mngon no// de nas shar
4a3: phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ pad ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
4a4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub
4a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig la brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming
4a6: yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dang / mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
4a7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas kyi bya ba yang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam
4a8: gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par
4b1: 'jig rten gyi khams de na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtsa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang /
4b2: rtsig pa dang / ri la sogs pa yang mi snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib
4b3: pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg ste/ bskul nas/ rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
4b4: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang / rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de
4b5: bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4b6: po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol bstan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha dpad ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba de
4b7: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa/ yid du mchi ba/ lus dang sems shin du dga' bar babyed
4b8: par byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags shes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
5a1: rigs kyi bu nub kyi phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin
5a2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ / bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs
5a3: rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa yid du'ong/
5a4: lus dang sems shin du rnam par dag par byed pa 'di phyung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa
5a5: sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags
5a6: rjen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
5a7: bu de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad blan man pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a8: pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog par shog sheg ces smon lam btab bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dang /
5b1: thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can
5b2: dedag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/ / bcom ldan na ka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i srad du pyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka'
5b3: sbal pa/ rigs kyi bud dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa yang yin la phyir ldog pa yang yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags la/ phyir ldog pa yang lags/
5b4: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/ sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung ston to// mtshan
5b5: thos pa de kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pazhig yod
5b6: de/ sa bon de las bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/ myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na rigs kyi bus bo na de la ji skad ces bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas nad ni yongs su
5b7: rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o/ / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
5b8: mi ldog pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//
6a1: bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thab pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba
6a2: dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo
6a3: spyan des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
6a4: pad mo'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa
6a5: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur bstir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad
6a6: ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod deng shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams
6a7: derabag yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang de dag ni rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram
6a8: @zer mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa/ brlang ba/ gtum pa/ zhe gcod pa mu chor smra ba/ pho theg can/ g.yengs pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ ngan pa'i ngang tshul can/ sdig pa'i chos
6b1: 6/ phrag dag dang se sas yongs su dbus pa/ nyon mongs padums nye par na mongs par gyur ba rnams te/ sems can 'dra ba de dag gnang na de bzhin gshegs pa dacos ston// byang chubs mas dang 'di dgags
6b2: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bdag de
6b3: bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gang de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i
6b4: sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci ngo mtshar gyi/ gang dag de ltar kun
6b5: nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs srid yang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs sa
6b6: 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul khrims yang dag par gzung ste/ spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems
6b7: yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to/ / de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang snying rje pa'i sems nye bar bzhag te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni
6b8: ches ngo mtshar to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de
7a1: dag thams cad kyis legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu 'thun pa'i rjes su bstan pa 'di mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
7a2: te rang rang gi gnas nas dor / / dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/ la las ni bai dur+ya'i
7a3: shing rnams/ la las ni shel gyi shing rnams/ la las ni dpag bsam gyi shing rnams/ la las ni gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni me tog gi shing rnams la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams/ la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/
7a4: la las ni brgyan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni bye ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni sil
7a5: snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to/ / mngon par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la bder
7a6: dod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma grogs po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo//
7a7: de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba lags par mngon par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas/ byang chub
7a8: sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
7b1: thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang pa dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing snang bar gyur pa
7b2: dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba'i lus su gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de dag 'od des
7b3: reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te/ phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang / gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar
7b4: mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lham me/ lhan ne lhang der ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas sdang bar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i
7b5: sems can dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang / ri gtang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang /
7b6: de ma yin pa'i rinag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang / blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/ 'og tu ni mnar med pa'i sems can chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs//
7b7: de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas
7b8: bo/ bturan ba 'dod pa rnams ni btu ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams nigs/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni gzhon pa/ nor 'dod pa rnams ni nor thob/ long ba rnams ni mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/ sman mo rnams nags
8a1: can du gyur/ smyos pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur/ sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
8a2: sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang g.ya mgo'i rig la ba dar nye ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra
8a3: bas khebs par kun du snang ngo / / steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad ma'i char mngon par rab tu bab bo// lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i spos kyi sprin
8a4: rnams dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tubab po// de dag mngon par rab tu bab pas sems can
8a5: gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ril shing tha mal pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par gyur par snang ngo // sa phyogs de dag rin po che'i shing
8a6: rnams dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun du snang ste// de dag kun du bzang por 'dug par gyur to// bar snang /
8a7: las lha'i sil snyan dag kyang 'byin cing sil spyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo // lum pa'i tshal rab mchog tu gang smras pa// mnyam med gzhan yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur// nam mkha'
8a8: mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du/ / ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// byang chub mchog du byang chub shing dbang drung // bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nas sangs rgyas pa// dri med gzi ldan da la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog
8b1: rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ / chos tshul 'di dag sgyum smig rgyu dang // chu zla 'dra bar gang gis rtogs gyur pa// bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos rnams sna tshogs
8b2: 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang / / gar mkhan tshon 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa// mig yo bsod nams gtar la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lpags// gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni// thugs rje thugs
8b3: kyis tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa/ / dri med grazhal de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lpags// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang // lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa// gti mug mu dpral
8b4: de la phyag 'tshal du/ / ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// gang gis mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing // thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dgal btang // mnyam med pa na mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog ra
8b5: 'di la bdag cag lhags/ / gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid// pad ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa// yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// mtshan gyi
8b6: me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku/ / dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang // yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags// tshigs
8b7: su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
8b8: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
9a1: dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / maud gal gyi bu shar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya
9a2: bzhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so// chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
9a3: nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes bu
9a4: dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
9a5: sel pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sathu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te byin nas/ bcom ldan
9a6: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//
9a7: grags chen shes rab chen po pa// thab chen dpa' bo chen po pa// srid pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po// nyon mongs rgal la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad du yang the le ste// kun nas rab tu ldan ner bzhugs// kun nas rnam par grol ba po//
9a8: phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la// rab tu mi skul ri bo bzhin// gting tshod yangs pa rgya mtsho 'dra// mu stegs kun nas mi spyod pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// bzod nas zhi shing ma
9b1: gyes pa/ / rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan// la la la ni lam yang bstan// la la yang dag nyid la bkod// la la yang dag mya ngan 'das// lal byang chub lung yang bstan// bag la nyal dang
9b2: bsams pa mkhyen/ / khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med// de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams// gzigs pas khyod kyi bka' 'grub bo// byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dri ma sna tshogs gzhan
9b3: rnams kyang / / khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs// rgal nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing // grol nas skye dgu grol mdzad de// srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so// srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag/
9b4: yun ring mi shes gnyed log rnams// sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod// gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang // thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs// dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na// 'dren pas de
9b5: ngag bstan du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste pad ma'i
9b6: snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sa la/
9b7: ba bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
9b8: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag gi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de
10a1: skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu pa
10a2: phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
10a3: dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams
10a4: lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shes rab phun sum tshogs pa
10a5: rnams lags/ ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom
10a6: ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na nam
10a7: mnga' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na zla ba lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na nyi ma lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/
10a8: ji ltar na pad ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags
10b1: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na grol
10b2: ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
10b3: cho ga gzung ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom
10b4: ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/ / ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byams
10b5: ba'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub/
10b6: sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par ros pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems kyi ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na skye ba dran pa rnams lags
10b7: ji ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par
10b8: 'gyur/ ji ltar na lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam ma log par spyod pa
11a1: rna lags/ bam ldan das na nga na bas mas dpa tag/ rnan ma dpang sems mnyam par banag pa rnams lags/ bamaldan das na byang chubamams sa dzad panas
11a2: gas/ des ngan chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang ba can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltang na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji sa na stan gcig pa rnams lags/
11a3: ka napas phyis ma 'an pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das m+bAr na byang chub sams dang 'dagon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ra na gang drang ba rnams lags/ jimar na blagapa cad rnams lags/ a na du thod pa nas
11a4: lags/ dza sa na cog pu pa rnams lags/ jiltar na gan rdo bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyad pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mad sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji lta na lu
11a5: 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chog dang / spyod yul dang / spyad pa dang / smon lam thun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ser sna dang phrag dag dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad la sems
11a6: snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nang rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob la
11a7: mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na don dam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na bdag shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags//
11a8: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/ ji ltar na mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye/ ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'tsho ba yongs su
11b1: dag pa rnams lags/ / / ran yang yangs sum smra ba rnams lags/ dzalta na bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jum gang khrag nyar ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ngas na
11b2: mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/ ji ltar na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsdu ba rnams lags/
11b3: ji ltar na bsam pa dang / bag la nyal 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na nges pa rnams lags// ji ltar na 'grogs na bde ba rnams lags/
11b4: ltar na bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsod nams bgyi
11b5: bal brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de
11b6: skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang /
11b7: po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don dri bar sems
11b8: dpa' legs so/ / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin du nyon la yid lazung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi
12a1: ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi
12a2: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du pan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
12a3: snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i/
12a4: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
12a5: sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems
12a6: can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la yang dag par ston to// ji ltar rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la yang dag par ston
12a7: de ltar gdol pa'am/ gdol bu la yang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa grong pa dang yul gyi mi gzhan dag lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa
12a8: phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang / mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag
12b1: kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhog go/ de sems can thams cad la bar 'du shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yin/ bur 'du shes pa yin/ gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/ nye du'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung bar
12b2: 'du shes pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyod kyi pha'am/ ma 'am bu 'am/ gnyen bshes sam nye du 'am/ stag gi
12b3: gnyen mtshams dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i phyir sems can de lta bu med do zhes gsungs so snyam nas/ de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/ srog chags chen po pa
12b4: gzhan la lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
12b5: dpa' sems can gang mi dge ba'i las byed pa rab tu mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdud cing / zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su 'god do// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan
12b6: 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/ de bas na bdag gis de
12b7: bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
12b8: chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'as sbyin pa sbyin pa yang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa me sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin//
13a1: g.yog gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no snyam te/ de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gnyis
13a2: phan btags pa'i lan du pan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi ra bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i
13a3: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang /
13a4: skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu'i bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/ de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing / de 'di snyam du sems can gang dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
13a5: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can dag ni sdug bsngal ba/ mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ rten med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun du 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon
13a6: dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / rten du gyur snyam nas/ de snying rje bas rab tu mi bzang de/ bdog pa ci yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so// phan btags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des
13a7: kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phan sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa
13a8: na/ bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/ brnyas shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ rtag pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing
13b1: dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ ci sbyin pa de yang sti stang du byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// ri mor byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa
13b2: phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma lta bu dang / chongs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/
13b3: lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des gus pa bskyed/ ri mo bskyed nas gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsdu ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dag byed do// de dag gi dge
13b4: ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la yang grogs su 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang
13b5: chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de// ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la spos dang / me
13b6: tog gam bdug pa'am/ byug pa'am/ skyad nul lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do// ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed ce na/ de chos nyan to// klog go/
13b7: 'chang ngo yi ger 'dri'o// kha ton byed de/ kun chub par byed do// sems so// ma log par sgom pa'i sbyor bas goms par byed de// de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed do// ji ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/ dgos dang / bsod
13b8: snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / chung ngun chu brang mo khyor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/ de ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang / rim gro'i
14a1: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha 'am lha la la zhig tu
14a2: shog shig/ ce'am/ rgyal po'am rgyal po la la zhig tu shog shig ces de ltar sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i yongs
14a3: su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin pa de dang de la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can
14a4: yin no/ / de de ltar so sor rtog pas gang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes pa dang / sbyin pa'i rim dang / sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// /
14a5: rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
14a6: na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ tshul bzhin ma
14a7: yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ las kyis 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/ 'jigs par lta ba rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i
14a8: tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
14b1: sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'am/ 'dul ba'am/ gnas gang yang rung ba la la dag tu bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du sems te/ gnas de dang de dag la shin du
14b2: legs par slob kyi/ rigs la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ lta ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ 'khor ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ gang zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ri mo med pa ma yin te/
14b3: ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor
14b4: thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis ni/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i yang
14b5: dag par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes rnam par dpyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i
14b6: bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mi smra ba yin/ dus mi
14b7: shes pa ma yin/ yul mi shes pa ma yin/ tshed mi shes pa ma yin te/ de sems can de rjes su bsrung ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing 'jam par smra ba dang /
14b8: dal bus smra ba dang / 'du 'di mi mang ba dang / rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dad pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang
15a1: chub sems dpa' bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa'i gnas de dag la gus par byed pa
15a2: yin/ / brtson par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/
15a3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la 'am/ yo byad kyis phongs pa'i
15a4: yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang ngo // 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang
15a5: zhe na/ mi sdug pa sgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o// skye bo bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen to// mi sdug pa bsgom pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la skra dang spu dang / sen mo dang so dang rdul dang dri ma dang / lpags pa dang sha dang rus
15a6: pa dang rgyus pa dang / rtswa dang mkhal ma dang snying dang mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang gtom dang po ba dang sul mangs dang / long ka dang lgang pa dang mtsho ra ba dang / phyi sa dang mchi ma dang / rdul dang snabs dang ngar snabs dang zhag dang / chu ser dang
15a7: rkang dang tshal dang / 'khris pa dang bad kan dang rnag khrag dang glang ba dang glang rgyas dang gcin dag yod de/ dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam
15a8: du byis pa blon po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed na/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa
15b1: sgom pa mang ba yin no/ / skye bo bzang modo gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med kyi gzugs bzang ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mdzes pa/ mig tu sdug pa/ sems 'phrog pa/ mthong yang ngas de lta bu dag mthong na/
15b2: 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/ byung nas med par gyur pa yin na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la 'dod chags skyed par byed ces gsungs so snyam
15b3: ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/
15b4: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la byams pa mang ba yin te/ de gzhi gang dang rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang / khon du 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/ de ltar na
15b5: byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no/ / de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam/ yo byad ma 'byor kyang
15b6: yongs su yi 'chang ba med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
15b7: chub sems dpa' gcig pu lkog du song ste/ rab tu dben pa la gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/ bdag ni rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o// dge sbyong
15b8: dam/ bram ze gzhan dag ni kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa/ 'dra 'dzi mad ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa
16a1: dang bral ba yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams bsad nams dag gus par bya'o// chung
16a2: khrims gus par srung ngo / / shes rab gus par bsgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod pa dang / 'thad pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
16a3: gsungs so snyam du spyod de/ de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na las kyis 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin
16a4: zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta zhing sdig pa chung ngu yang khyad du yang mi gsod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams dug chung ngus kyang
16a5: skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong rnams dug chen pos kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do// sdig pa chung ngus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do// zhes
16a6: gsungs so snyam du sems te/ de de ltar yongs su rtogs pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin
16a7: zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig/
16a8: bu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang bye ru la sogs pa nor dang yo byad kyi rnam pa dag 'dems kyang / de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi bskyed do// /
16b1: gal te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dngas pa'i byor las su bskos nas dngas po des kyang nye bar ma 'am ste/ de 'di snyam du sems shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'as ni bdag gi lus
16b2: las sha zas kyang TI/ gzhan gyis zas sam/ skam mam/ ya byed kyi rnam pa gang ci yang rung bdag ma byin la/ ma gnang bar spyad pa ni ma rung shes gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' jigs par lta ba yin no//
16b3: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brten pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis gcas sam/ nor dang / 'khrig pa'i yan lag gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mo 'gyur zhes
16b4: nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brten pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa 'tshul khrims srang na/
16b5: tshul khrims 'dis bdag ltar shog shig ce'am/ lha la lar shag shig ce'am/ rgyal por shog shig ce'am/ rgyal po la lar shog shig ces sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims
16b6: pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag dang yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin/
16b7: ngag dang yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ ji ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang lus kyi ngan du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ lus kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
16b8: srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/ de ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// ji ltar na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag thams
17a1: cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub bo dang / tshig kyal ba ste/ de ltar ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no// ji ltar na yid kyis
17a2: yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag yid kyis ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o//
17a3: de ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
17a4: phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ phyi'i bzod pa phun
17a5: sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i
17a6: bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dgos pa la me lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
17a7: dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang
17a8: 'di dag nang gi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la/ yongs su yid mi 'chad de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs
17b1: pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las spros pa 'am/ tha las smos pa 'am/ nye du las smos pa'am/ mkhan po las smos pa
17b2: 'am/ slob dpon las spros pa'i tshig gi la ni ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa pha rol las thos sam/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la mi snyan par brjod pa thos na/ mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la khon du mi
17b3: 'dzin te/ de bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe
17b4: na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyun chad pa/ mtshams sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba sdur med pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad thog ma nas
17b5: zhi ba'o/ / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur te/ chos 'di dag ma shes ma thob par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
17b6: mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du sems te/ de'i phyir gang chos 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / sems dpa' dang / sgom pa dang / yongs su klog pa dang / mos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub
17b7: sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/
17b8: gnod sems kyi bsam pa skyes na/ 'di ltar khro ba 'di gang nas byung / gang du 'gags/ gang la 'byung / ji ltar 'byung / ji'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ des de ltar yongs su brtags na/ khro ba'i skye ba'ang yang
18a1: dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang la skye bde yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ji ltar skye ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rkyen gang gis skye ba de yang yang dag
18a2: par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la kun nas ldang ba mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
18a3: dpa' nyi tsha ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin par bzod la mtshan mo mi bzod pa 'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa'am/ bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul/
18a4: na mi bzod pa'am/ gzhan gyi yul na bzod la bdag gi yul na ma bzod pa 'am/ bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems
18a5: dpa' ni dus thams cad du'ang bzod/ yul thams cad du'ang bzod/ thams cad la'ang bzod pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
18a6: tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ba dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / bu dang / bu mo/ dang / chung ma dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams la bzod la/ gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin/
18a7: gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan chad la yang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i
18a8: bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yid med/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' don gyi byad brjod pa ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ lan thogs su re ba'i phyar ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis ma yin no// ngo tsha bas bzod pa
18b1: ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' na rtag par yang bzod pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chu bsams dang dogos pa la me lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i bcod
18b2: pa phran sa mtshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chubasems dpa' dgas la khro ba skad pa'i rgyan gang gis zil gyis don na/ la chur gyis 'chog par 'gyur ba'am/ thal mos 'tshig par 'thur ba 'ang/ dbyig pas brdeg
18b3: 'gyur ba'am/ mtshon gyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/ ma gtsigs pa'i tshig gis don du brjod par 'gyur ba 'di lta rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te la la zhig gis brdegs
18b4: sam/ sdigs sam/ spros sam/ brgyab na/ de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di dag byas te/ bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// mas ma byas/ phas ma byas/ nye du dang / snag gi gnyen
18b5: mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur gyi/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /
18b6: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin du nang gi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
18b7: ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o/ / de ltar ma log par rtog pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis/ rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/ rnam par ma dkrugs kyang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i
18b8: bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod ches
19a1: sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur la/ de la sems can de dag gis mi snyan par brjod kyang rung / kyal kyang rung / btsas kyang rung ste/ mkhro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bur mi
19a2: ston gyi/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bzung ba ste/ sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyed par bya ba yin la/ de ltar yongs su bsrung ba na/ brlag par bya ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o zhes
19a3: de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ bzod sa dang du lin la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam
19a4: bcas pa las sgrol ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na
19a5: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'das du bying ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrags kyis/ de ltar na sems can thams ca
19a6: bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dul ba dang / zhi ba la rab tu bkod par brtson pa la bdag nyid khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / mi bzod pa med pa dang / phogs byed pa
19a7: ni dag gi ma cha'o/ / gam du semasas// rigs kyi bu 'di la sa dper na sman pazungs can zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang ba rib kyis mngangs par byu nas/ sman pades 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can
19a8: dag gi rab rib kyi spyan bsal bar bya'o zhes bsams la/ de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang mdongs par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ji ga sman pa des sems can de dgag rab rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar
19b1: rnas sam gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das dem lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten ma shes pa'i rabar bgyis mangs pa'i gtisugs/
19b2: drimags rab kyi mig gas bal bar 'ad la/ bdag dbangs shes pa ba kyis mangs na dag ga sa byam du sems te/ dada' byar ban ca dang du len laganang sems sa mang payin te/ de sar na byang chub sems
19b3: dpa'adasam bcas pa las skal bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum chags pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu ba de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' badzad pa kun su mchags pa rnam sa yinan/
19b4: 'phags pa dkan mchag sprin// bam pa gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu chos sud ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btsun 'grus phran sum tshogs pa rnams yin na// bcug shi na/ 'di ste// rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus
19b5: can rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ 'bang ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgun du
19b6: chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus
19b7: can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlab
19b8: dang / ma rgal bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/
20a1: dad ltar ban 'grus brtsam pa shing gnas pa drung du bdud sdig can 'das nas byang chub sems dpa 'a de la rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i btsun 'grus thang shig/ daci'i byor she na/ rigs kyi bungs kyang sems can ci 'angs
20a2: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan ma 'das pa las bzla ba dang / margal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma byin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par
20a3: rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/ de ni brdzun dang 'did pa'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig gis kyang bla na med pa yang
20a4: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma shes so/ / rigs kyi bungs ni sems can bye ba du mnyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas shes kyis
20a5: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlog shig/ don med par nyon mongs pa la rten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing kyal ka byed kyang / de la byang chub sems dpa' 'de snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig
20a6: can bdag la kyal ka byed par 'dod do snyam ste/ des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/ sdig can khyed bya ba nyud du gyis shig 'jig rten gyi sgo sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las
20a7: bdag gis bya ba ni 'jig rten yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o// las kyi skye gnas pa'i// las la ston pa'o zhes gsungs te/ sdig can khyod kyang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi
20a8: skye gnas pa/ las la ston pa yin gyis/ sdig can khyod gang nas 'ongs pa'i lam nas song shig/ de la kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o// bdud sdig
20b1: can de yang bdag gi sems ni sems kyis tshor bar rig nas yibs yibs te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te dad pa dang
20b2: dpral bar byas kyang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dzum/ zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
20b3: sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/ cha dang / bgrang ba
20b4: dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bstod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin
20b5: cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i
20b6: brtson 'grus can yan zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ha cang brtun das pa 'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang brtun das pa'i brtson 'grus ni yab yab por 'gyur/ ha cang zhan pa ni
20b7: le lor 'gyur te/ da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson
20b8: 'grus rtsol ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / mtshan dang dab byad bzang po phun sum tshogs
21a1: pa dang / ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi che ba khyu mchog de yang bdag la yang yod par 'gyur ro zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems
21a2: dpa' rabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gsar ram/ nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma dang skyon thams rang dang bral ba ni
21a3: lham me lhan ne ltung de ste/ de ni a la la 'bar ba'i gser ro// a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin no//
21a4: brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// snyom las ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// zas la chong mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// bdag mi shes pa ni brtson
21a5: 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// 'du 'dzini brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/ de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o// de dag ni byang chub sems
21a6: dpa' la med pa yin te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang
21a7: chub sems dpa' rgyun du ma chad pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sems skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom pa
21a8: deni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ de ltar
21b1: rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa/ byang chub kyi lam
21b2: gyi tshogs dang 'thun pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub du 'brang ba de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems sgrub phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi sbyin che ba lta ci smos te/ de ni rnam par dag pa'i
21b3: brtson 'grus shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di
21b4: snyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang bar gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig
21b5: cig sdug bsngal zhing skabs med/ mgon med de/ gnas med rten med pa zhig yod na'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de la rkang gis 'bogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas sems can gcig
21b6: po de dag thar bar bya bar bdag spron sdug bsngal phal lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa
21b7: zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar mi brnyes pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub selas dpa' 'di snyam du mir gyur pas ni byang
21b8: chub thob par dka' ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni chung shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/ byang chub ni mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du gsal ba mang po// bskal pa brgya phrag mang po// bskal pa stong phrag mang po// bskal pa brgya
22a1: stong phrag mang bar bsgrub dgos pas bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ byang chub sems dpas ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22a2: gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang / gar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di 'dra ba dang / lam 'di 'dra ba dang / brtson 'grus 'di
22a3: 'dra bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par
22a4: sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/ bdag kyang ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad la
22a5: dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar brtsal lo 'bad de/ / bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma
22a6: yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyoms pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhen/ 'di la byang
22a7: rlabasems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na brtson 'grus de'i ro myang bar mi byedad/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi spod/ bdag la migarjo de/ de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las la brtson pa
22a8: gzhan la smad snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyoms pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa dadag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum
22b1: tshogs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis bstan pa rnams yin/ slob med pa
22b2: rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ ma log par gdams ngag bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/ dbang pon pa rnams
22b3: yin/ sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'dis
22b4: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du bsags shing tshe rabs tha dad pa de dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bram ze'i rags shing
22b5: sal chen po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu gad dang gang du skyes kyang khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ de skyes nas kyang rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel
22b6: zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam/ byang chub sems dpa' dag go/
22b7: deskyes na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms pas 'di ltar spyod de/ kye ma skye dgu 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di na nyam thag pa'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni na ba'o// kye ma mya dgu 'di ni mi gnas pa'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni yun
22b8: ring po nas nang bar gyur pa'o/ / kye ma skye dgu 'di ni gti mug gis mdongs pa'o// de 'ang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bstan pa ni bdag gis mi cha'i//
23a1: 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag par ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni
23a2: mtshan shag ti lta bu'o/ / 'dod pa rnams ni ral gri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni skul gyi mgo lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni rul pa'o// 'dod pa rnams
23a3: ni dring ba'o zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de de ltar skyo nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang
23a4: khong du ma chud pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// de de'i rgyu de de'i rkyen de'i gzhis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul du
23a5: bshad pa thos pa 'dzin to/ / de gnyis ka la yang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par bsgom mo// gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i
23a6: chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
23a7: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// des lam khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i dbang po can yin no// de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'o dbang po can yin pas/ dben pa mad ba yin
23a8: te/ de 'du ba thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo 'du 'dzi thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong de/ slab la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / lha la
23b1: dam par rtog pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / / shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spang ste/ de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa
23b2: yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam du bdag gis sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/ de ste mi dge ba'am/ 'on tam lung du ma bstan pa 'am/ chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyod de/ gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems dga' ba dang /
23b3: rangs pa dang / mos bskyed do// dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun no// 'on te mi dge ba la spyod na de la skyob mang ba dang / rtog pa mang ba yin te/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag
