45b3: la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag tu 'dud par byed/ rab tu rnyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi snang bar byed
45b4: do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams gzugs dang / dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang /
45b5: stobs dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos bdag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag stong pa rnams
45b6: la de dang khyed zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal tshoms par byed cing dge ba'i dri med pa la sbyor bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing
45b7: 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog snga
45b8: tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can/ klu rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa/ glog gi phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig
46a1: rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / tog dang / sdang ba yangs su bskyed par byar char gyi rkun can pa rtag tu rgyud pa dbang
46a2: mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas spong ngo / / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang lus sna tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa
46a3: snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i glog gis phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba/ yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pa sgrogs pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par mthob/ chos
46a4: gyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par byed pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing ngan sod dang mi khom pa la sogs pa nas sems can rnams rnam par bslang ste/ rnam
46a5: pa thams cad du mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas/ lha dang
46a6: mi dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa mchog du gyur pa/ dga' ba dang bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang / rtsi chen po dang / sdong po thams cad rnam par
46a7: skyed pa dang / thams cad du sbrid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
46a8: nabyang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung /
46b1: yar dranam tha bya rgyun gyi snying ba can ldang na/ sems can rnams kyi gdung sa yongs suzhi bar byas gang / lum shin dasim pa dang / bsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang drang ma yang sems can dab tu
46b2: 'ad gas dang / rdzu / gnyisapa dang / ran 'gro dang/ nga pa bas pa dang / sa byab dang / zi sa dang / bongs pas bad pa dang / thal la srid pa dang / sngag pa dang / ma jug pa da gral zhi ma pa dang / nad rnam
46b3: namadas pas yin pa chos la med pa la sogs pa'i gdung bdag dam pa'i nas kyi chang dang dres pa'i bran med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon las dang / mthong ba dang / rig pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa dan
46b4: yod pa la sogs pa sa dang kyizhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'tho ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gang ba btsun par byed cing ldan mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god payin no// naH rduH
46b5: sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkang polas bathun par gyur pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / nub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can
46b6: thams cad 'tshal/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i chos dkar po'i drung mang nye bar spyod ba bran sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dag
46b7: bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na rlung ma nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug ri dag dang / khor yug chen po rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi
46b8: yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil labar rnams dang / rgyam ma na pa che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / ra ba dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa'i na pa tsha'i dang / gas dang / da sus kyi da ldang ba dang /
47a1: rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag dang / bkod pa rnam par phye ba
47a2: sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub po/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun du sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye bar sgrub bo// skyed do// yongs su gzhog go// de
47a3: la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / ji ltar gling chen po bzhi pa dang ri rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
47a4: phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / ji ltar na stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar
47a5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa/ shin du rnam
47a6: par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa
47a7: phun tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ / de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// gling dang / bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi pa la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su
47a8: smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ltar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag pa sems shing gi
47b1: nags tshal ltar ni sa dang pha rol du phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya
47b2: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur bdam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i
47b3: mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
47b4: cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang
47b5: 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i
47b6: dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can yod do cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos
47b7: po de lta bra sha stag dang / so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/
47b8: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
48a1: khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
48a2: 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i blung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po cig gcig ldan par
48a3: gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i
48a4: dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i dus gsum pa
48a5: thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin
48a6: gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo/ / ba spu'i khud bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu las dpe byad bzang po re re mngon
48a7: par 'grub bo/ / depe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsi dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub po// de yang brjod du med pa
48a8: bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zlab nyi ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo/ / de yang brjod du med pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur/
48b1: bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing blta/ ji sdang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub po// de yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig
48b2: b rgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam
48b3: pa yongs su sim par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dugo bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar
48b4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun du rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs/
48b5: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i
48b6: lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba/ dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser las byas pa'i snod
48b7: rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig du blangs shing khyer yang ba
48b8: spu'i khung bu gcig du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ga ba'am 'bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// de las bcu gnyis gang
49a1: zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'bro ba can dang / shin du dka' rgyal dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / me g.yo ba
49a2: dang / lags pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'ong de/ bcu gnyis po de ni de dag go/ de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang /
49a3: log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba
49a4: thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa
49a5: sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba'i
49a6: pad mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyud dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin du rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgom pas thogs pa med cing yid du 'ong
49a7: ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i lhas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa/ phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'byed phra
49a8: shizhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba/ yang dag par mnon pa'i dbang dang byin gyi brlabs la mkhas
49b1: ba/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgod pag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ bltan bzang
49b2: z hing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro
49b3: la sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa
49b4: grangs med pas rnam par rol pa/ chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba 'thob pa/ bskal pa
49b5: byeb khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar byin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs
49b6: par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems me bskyed pa'i sa'o/ / rigs
49b7: kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams
49b8: cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'od ni mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun du shin du lta
50a1: bar sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ti nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcug she na/ 'di lta /
50a2: rin chen kun tu 'phags dang / shin du gnas pa dang / mi skul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / de ltar gyi sangs
50a3: rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin na mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang
50a4: skur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil ba mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug
50a5: pa dang / so sa yang dag par rig pa rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis rlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/
50a6: de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i na ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon pa
50a7: shes pa'i shes pa dang / gang zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/ dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe tshad bskal ba grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshol dbang bdang /
50a8: ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo
50b1: byang la dbang dang / dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob paston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs
50b2: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
50b3: 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / seM so yang dag par rig
50b4: pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpa byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / dus thams cad du gtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la/
50b5: yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub paston pas ye shes la dbang bas ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so//
50b6: de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i
50b7: stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang
50b8: zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyi spyod pas smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su
51a1: dge ba'i srung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dang ba ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur
51a2: ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs
51a3: pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma snyan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams
51a4: yin/ / ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams
51a5: dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad bsdud pa rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gi theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung bstan rnams
51a6: theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang snrel gzhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'dra mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs
51a7: thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dag ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad
51a8: yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams dang / byis pa dang / nyan thos mi zad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dag pa mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar bstan pa'i thams
51b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang skur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bcwa brgyad pa de dag ni byang
51b2: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las
51b3: kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad
51b4: du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang rnam par ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi
51b5: gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
51b6: mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur
51b7: bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
51b8: rnams so/ / de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba med pa dang / tsa tsa med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /
52a1: tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /
52a2: shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus lam chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang
52a3: da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes mngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi
52a4: rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bcwa brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/
52a5: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis
52a6: gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med pa na sems can rnams ni bdag med bsam mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa na
52a7: sems can rnams ni sems can du sla'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni srog med pa na sems can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems cananams la de bzhin
52a8: gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa na sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni med pa na/
52b1: sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas med pa na sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
52b2: gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa na sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni da yir bya ba med pa na
52b3: sems can rnams ni de yid bya ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa na sems can rnams ni yongs su bzung ba la brtson no zhes sems
52b4: can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa na sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos
52b5: thams cad ni ma skyes pa na sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni ma 'phos ma byung ba na sems can rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la rten
52b6: tozhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa na sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
52b7: chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang
52b8: bral ba ni sems can rnams zhe sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes
53a1: de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin
53a2: gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni
53a3: mngon par 'du byed pa med na sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa ni sems can rnams ni
53a4: spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni stong pa na sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
53a5: pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa na sems can rnams ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni smon
53a6: pa med pa na sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / skye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod
53a7: sems kyi tha ba'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig
53a8: rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing la mnyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag la yang dag pa'i lam du gzung bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
53b1: chen po skye'o/ / kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba
53b2: dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la 'god do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni pra smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'brul sred pas
53b3: 'khol ba ste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis de dag la shin du mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi
53b4: rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'dring bar gnas pa yin gyis de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di
53b5: dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin gyis de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin du zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin du chog
53b6: par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin du nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las phyung zhing
53b7: khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste/ bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i
53b8: mtshan nyid yin no/ / de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
54a1: gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs
54a2: rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye ste/ rigs
54a3: kyi bu rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
54a4: d pa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa
54a5: sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o/ / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
54a6: sems skyes so/ / srog chags brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de
54a7: dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos kyi rnam par 'god pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs
54a8: pas bstan kyang mtha' med na sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par
54b1: 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i sreg nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag du med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni rlung
54b2: gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya chel bstan zhing srabs 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi bar bcas pa/ ri rab dang / ri btang zung dang / ri btang zung chen po dang /
54b3: gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi dang ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub
54b4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri ra ba dang /
54b5: rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang zung dang / ri btang zung chen po dang / gdas dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos
54b6: kyi ngang ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol du phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
54b7: dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to//
54b8: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med
55a1: pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta
55a2: ste/ dper na rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/ nags tshal dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / mdab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu
55a3: gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang / nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su gzhog cing / rnam par 'byed de
55a4: gsal bar byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
55a5: tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhag par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// 'di
55a6: dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o/ / 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni mor sgrub pa'o//
55a7: 'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yid gzhungs
55a8: pa dang / dpal chen po sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni sbyar rtsal to// 'di dag ni bzo' gnas so// 'di dag ni gtsug lag sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos
55b1: su 'gyur ba'o/ / 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang / gzhan gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun du
55b2: bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ / de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon
55b3: par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag
55b4: la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par
55b5: dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin du byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du
55b6: 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsams kyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang / mi rnams shin du dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan
55b7: med par rnam par rtse ba dang / nyams bde zhing yongs su spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / yid bde bas yongs su mi nyam pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / rnga dang /
55b8: sil snyan la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs/ yongs su smod cing 'byin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs
56a1: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang gis sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las
56a2: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / mi nyam pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang bar/
56a3: gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi snang bar 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / 'di lta bu 'das
56a4: pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos slad du byung ba dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so// lugs dang mthun pa
56a5: dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub pa'o// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod//
56a6: cing ston la rnam par dag par byed do// chos thams cad ston/ kun du yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed do//
56a7: chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas par
56a8: byed do/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin du byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// ji ltar
56b1: na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang /
56b2: nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho/
56b3: par 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong
56b4: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / rtseg med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bur
56b5: stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo / / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang / ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon pa
56b6: dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos
56b7: kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dang ldan pa/ bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhag pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/ yang dag par sems nang du
56b8: gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la rten te/ srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su
57a1: brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa
57a2: rnam par gzhig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
57a3: dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags bting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri ba dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa
57a4: dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su skor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho ba dang / 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi
57a5: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
57a6: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can brlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul bcu po 'di bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das
57a7: ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang
57a8: bcas par thob par 'gyur te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa la sogs pa zhig bgyid na'ang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang tshabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom
57b1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bud de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu chos rnams la nan tan byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas
57b2: pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhal ba ste/ sdug bsngal
57b3: thams cad la rten pa'o/ / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog sbyin// bam po bzhi pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
57b4: sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma meng ba rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa
57b5: rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams
57b6: yin/ / rtog gi'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
57b7: sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang /
57b8: yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / re rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang/
58a1: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
58a2: dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sem par byed pa
58a3: dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams yin/ chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams bri bar byed pa dang / rab tu sngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa
58a4: rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi
58a5: lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba sha ra na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bas rab tu
58a6: sim par byed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad
58a7: kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na thab shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems shin du dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
58a8: dba' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang pa dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no//
58b1: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yar gyi rol zla ba nya ste/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa
58b2: nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs
58b3: kyigyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba mar gyi ngol dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zher yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bcwa lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba
58b4: yang na ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni/ / de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad du thams cad rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu
58b5: 'bri'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
58b6: dpa' zla ba shar na yang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las rnam
58b7: par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang / bsal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa/ rdzus ste skyes pa/ pha ma'i brtsog pa dang /
58b8: mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/ gling bzhir snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
59a1: sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa
59a2: yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin
59a3: no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthun
59a4: ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu
59a5: sim par byed pa nas 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra
59a6: ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par
59a7: shes pa rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa
59a8: rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ ji ltar skye bo dge
59b1: ba dga' ba'i phyir du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to//
59b2: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par dbye bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma
59b3: shang na phyogs bcu/ thams cad du lhan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ned byed kyang sems can
59b4: rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i
59b5: chos rnams shar ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
59b6: nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams
59b7: cad la ye shes kyi snang bar byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od
59b8: mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams
60a1: cad 'od med pa 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shang na
60a2: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi nyams pa legs par ston to/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to//
60a3: rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na rmo brko ba'i las kyi
60a4: mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang byang chub dge ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/
60a5: mi srun pa'i rang bzhin dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang / skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur la/ lam ngan
60a6: par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
60a7: las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
60a8: byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi brtabs pa rnams
60b1: yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams yin/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams
60b2: yin/ bdag gis brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog bsrung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tshab nas
60b3: dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog bsrung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas pag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
60b4: seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang pag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi rtabs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
60b5: seng ge yang pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du
60b6: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis bskugs na mi zlogs shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang wa thams cad
60b7: phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog go/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dgas
60b8: rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag gdul
61a1: ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni kun du lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
61a2: dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
61a3: sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing / nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dab na spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du
61a4: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyis brag ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i
61a5: khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag gis brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'joms so// de
61a6: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
61a7: grong gi mdab gang na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo thog rnams chud mi bzon to/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi de dgas pra
61a8: mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog chung mi bzon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag me tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
61b1: chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems byi dor
61b2: shin du byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po khyer phod pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams
61b3: yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang / khagasag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo rgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
61b4: dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa med pas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun
61b5: nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun mi bcad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam/
61b6: pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhag pas nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs
61b7: pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tshom med pa rnams yin/ rang gi sa lam mthong bas gzhan
61b8: gyis mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na smin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams
62a1: yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chung ngu yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/
62a2: tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/
62a3: shin du yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa yin pa nas ji ltar na shin du yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni chu'i nang nas
62a4: 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang /
62a5: shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi dgos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
62a6: dper na pad ma la ni chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi chags so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par gyur pa'i snyi phyogs de
62a7: dris khyab par 'dug go/ / de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa
62a8: phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grod pa dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ma
62b1: yin te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa
62b2: yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni kha 'byen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub
62b3: sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin du dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
62b4: rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang zhing mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni rmi lam dang / ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don
62b5: 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du'ang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin
62b6: no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni na ma rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab dang / byang chub kyi yan lag me tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o//
62b7: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de na bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsdams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ mya ngan lce'i dbang po tshim
62b8: par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe na bltas na mig
63a1: gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyanan na pa'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri bsdams na snga'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ myangs na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/
63a2: reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi
63a3: dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin du yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
63a4: sbyor ba dag gis shin du yongs su bzung ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas/ shin du yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
63a5: dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub bo// zhes
63a6: sems rgya cher skyed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ thun mad pa
63a7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa
63a8: 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems tsam gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems
63b1: can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/ / shes rab kyi gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mgon med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang /
63b2: rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnyen bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed // lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze
63b3: dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par brtse'o// glang po chen po'i blta bas
63b4: blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed ngo do/ / sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ dga' bar spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no//
63b5: zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin
63b6: no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin du gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub yid
63b7: la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson pa chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs
63b8: pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas dag gi tshul 'chos
64a1: pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang / ngag gi 'dod pa chung ba dang / sems kyi smon pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa
64a2: yang chud me gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi sbyang / yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad byas pa yang tshor zhing
64a3: de la stong par byed/ gzed stong par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar smra ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dag gis
64a4: snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dag gis stong cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dag gis 'jam par smra zhi
64a5: sems kyis zhel non te shar gnyer ba rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis des pa ston cing sems kyis khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor
64a6: bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul mi 'chos kha gsag mi byed/ 'dzangs pa dang / phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin// sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub
64a7: sems dpa' rnams 'thab smin mi byed/ phan tshun dbar ba 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo bskyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra ba las su rung ba yang sgrub po// /
64a8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bskur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
64b1: bstan pa la sbar ba ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sra dang kha spu bregs/ gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang dag par dad pas de
64b2: bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / / de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos gtse ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis gtse ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas gtse ba med pa dang /
64b3: med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par bcu 'byung ngo // ded de rab tu byung nas dge ba tsa yin zhes 'tshal ba yin te/ de dge ba ni yin nas tshol ba yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la basbyin par med/ sbyin par
64b4: byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan byed/ dargyal gyi zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ deng rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin
64b5: rtogs pa thob bo/ / de lam shin du rtogs pas chos nyid thob bo// chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bskur ba ma
64b6: btab pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa
64b7: nams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyis gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
64b8: yang dag par sgrub dang / byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam//
65a1: pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ji ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par/
65a2: dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal
65a3: med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med cing the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba
65a4: la mngon par dad do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni
65a5: mngon sum du lung ston pa dang / gsang ste lung ston pa dang / ldem po dag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes pa mi 'byung //
65a6: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad du spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad du spangs pa/ rdul thams cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/
65a7: dang / dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni
65a8: de kho na'o/ / 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas pa 'di la nem nur med/ the tshom med de de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
65b1: yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas mi dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin
65b2: gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis shes par mi
65b3: nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba// brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin du 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ nam ma'
65b4: dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med the tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
65b5: pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad pa des na de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi rgyu/ byang chub kyi gzhi/
65b6: byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang / mthu
65b7: brtan pa dang / rtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
65b8: pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha bstan pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel
66a1: zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
66a2: yang dag sgrub pa la mngon par dad do/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i
66a3: mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa thob bo/ / lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang /
66a4: dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas shes pa chags pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa thob bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi
66a5: ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ dag ging na du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skung ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i phyir
66a6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og du ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/ / sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ de dag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/
66a7: yid kyi legs par brjod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas bde
66a8: 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la lta ste/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o// de yang 'di
66b1: snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so//
66b2: bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni ma slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tsom med do// gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa
66b3: de ni byang chub ces bya'o/ / bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas na rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems
66b4: dpa' theg pa cig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dang ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig khon te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni
66b5: mi slu ba'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin pa'o// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa'i rnams ming gis tha dad
66b6: par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i klang du 'dra'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la brten to// 'dzam bu'i rdzing gi grangs su 'gro'o// de'i phyir gling cig khon ste/ de ni 'jam bu'i gling // de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ning ba'i chagashes
66b7: pa'i theg par 'dra'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o// de'i phyir theg pa gcig kho na te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur
66b8: med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do// rnga ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di mdo sde dang de dag las de bzhin
67a1: gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams
67a2: la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon pas dang do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa gsung sgra'i dbyangs
67a3: zab mo la mngon par dang cen/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di na yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'o lha'i bu rnams
67a4: gyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de
67a5: bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so// gang 'di de bzhin
67a6: gshegs pa bsam pa dang / bag la nyal mkhyen to// sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs cig brjod pas the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams
67a7: 'dul lo/ / sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go snyam thos pa 'di ni
