67a8: yang dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi
67b1: buchos bcu po de dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nung med pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' bo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin
67b2: poche'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ pags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rodang stan cig pa 'dug pa rnams yin//
67b3: rogacig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun med pa rnams yin/ dus las mi yol ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gar pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal
67b4: rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpeng na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po cha thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po/
67b5: chathang bas mi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'brang gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che blang bas ma zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
67b6: mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gtid dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
67b7: ste/ / dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
67b8: dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis bab/ bags kyis bab po// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab// thams cad mkhyen
68a1: ba nyid la bab bo/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon
68a2: mongs pa'i dod mi dag pa'i grogs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di la ste/ dper na rgya mtshochen por chub ji snyed bab pa de thams cad kyang
68a3: cig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ra'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshes dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de dag / thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ra'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
68a4: dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la za ba'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zad kyang de la bri ba'am/ gang par mi mngon no// rigs
68a5: gyi 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na u0f7f
68a6: mtsho chen po ni 'thung po mang po'i gnas so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang / tshes dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can
68a7: thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bude ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur ba
68a8: nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// bcug
68b1: zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba lam khas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin// chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa
68b2: rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras
68b3: pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na khe na
68b4: la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun du 'bar ro// rab tu 'bar ro// kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig
68b5: rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo// de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag
68b6: ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go/ chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
68b7: nyid khong du chad pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab
68b8: tu shes so/ / chos thams cad yang dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis mi
69a1: khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la las snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de ltar na blon ba mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
69a2: kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so/ / des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs so// don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo // de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor
69a3: pa'i btson ra nas thar par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas/ de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa
69a4: rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go/ chos thams cad sems can med pa dang /
69a5: srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su
69a6: brtag pa dang / rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med ces bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pa/ srog med pa// zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs//
69a7: pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang /
69a8: stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang ches nyid dang mi 'gal
69b1: pade ni rigs pa'o/ / gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul de de na rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag spobs pas na de'i phyir rig par spobs pa rnams
69b2: shes par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag de dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//
69b3: bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyan chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi rtabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mazhum pa rnams yin/ spongs
69b4: pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyis mnon pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//
69b5: rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe
69b6: na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yang yod po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs
69b7: bden dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
69b8: spobs pa ni 'dar 'dar po ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyis 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo brtan zhing
70a1: mi 'thun pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni zhan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na
70a2: mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi snang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni yang yeng po med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon
70a3: mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yang yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs
70a4: kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtsug lag thams cad la
70a5: 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gtsug lag gi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar gyur gyi/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
70a6: kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyor ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa
70a7: rnams kyi ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba 'am/ gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
70a8: nams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin/ skabs shes pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ mi snyam pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i
70b1: phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
70b2: dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa
70b3: can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/
70b4: bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi dom pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par
70b5: 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/ 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//
70b6: byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed de// byang chub
70b7: sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub
70b8: sems dpa' mi ngoms pa ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' brnyes pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems
71a1: can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mad bas
71a2: sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
71a3: sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar byed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
71a4: rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston to/ / zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ga tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ ma dad pa med pa rnams la
71a5: ma yin/ g.yo dang chus glags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tshor ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar
71a6: lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la tshes mi ston to/ / rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med/ sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa
71a7: yang med sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems
71a8: dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
71b1: rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /
71b2: g.yo med pa rnams dang / sna med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'tshes pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
71b3: su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rna ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba de bzhin
71b4: gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi bu ches bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
71b5: sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang gang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir
71b6: chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / yang dag par sgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// byang chub
71b7: sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/ / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos stan kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba yang mi dmigs so// skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang
71b8: bral ba dang / 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
72a1: kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i yang mi dmigs so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang dam
72a2: bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par
72a3: zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang ba da du 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs so/ / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
72a4: chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ tha snyad la brten te/ brtags
72a5: pa la brten te/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsog go// gsob bo// gang gsog dang gso ba de la don dam pa med do// gang la don dam pa med pa de brdzun te slu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i chos
72a6: den gyis pa skye ba gruba'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnamapa yin no// / pa phags pa dkon mchog sbyin// bam pa ldag// rigs kyi bu chom bcu dang ldanan/
72a7: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs las kyang me 'byung / chos kyi rjes bu'ang 'brang la/
72a8: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung /
72b1: chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang las 'da' bar yang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la sems can gyi
72b2: phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
72b3: de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can
72b4: rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin du yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang
72b5: bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes
72b6: rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/ de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brtan te gnas so// de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pas na mi
72b7: dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med cing
72b8: lam gyi rgyun mi bcad pas shin du yongs su deg cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / de shin du yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas yin no// de gdams dag la ri mo dang /
73a1: bcas pa yin pa zhid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i ltabs mi 'gyung ngo // de dmigs pa'i sba ba dang bral bas lam du 'dug go// de lam du zhugs pas de 'on mthong ngo // byang chub
73a2: sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad dam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das depon nas bgyi ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de 'an nas bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so//
73a3: gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang mi slub de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi sgrub zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
73a4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ den de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 'di ces bgyi ba 'di'i ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di
73a5: ni so so rang gis rig pa yin te/ 'di ni yi ge dag gis gdams par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra sams nams pa ga nga das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa
73a6: ngag gi lam thams cad las 'das pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ bye ba dang / btsums pa thams cad dang bral ga rtog gi thams cad dang bral ba/ rtag par byab ma yin// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dgapa
73a7: 'das pa/ mtshan pa med pa/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdug thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ non mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang
73a8: dag par 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i gud yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas ma yin pa/ miganas pa/ zhig/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa
73b1: drim med pa/ mgos pa dang rnam par dag pa/ gya nom pa/ mchog dam pa/ phul brtan pa/ ther zug mi 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi dbyangs 'das
73b2: 'dug pa kho na'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob nas sems can de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
73b3: dga' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings shes bya'o//
73b4: gnyis su med pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
73b5: stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o// rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes
73b6: rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
73b7: mthong ngo / / lus kyis ni mngon du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos
73b8: khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs
74a1: kyi bde lta bas na depe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'brog chen por dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/ mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ad/
74a2: ste// de yang dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras ste/ kye skyes bu kho bo dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen na/ 'tshe'am/ lteng
74a3: ka'am/ / rdzang gang chubasil ba dang rnyog pa med pa/ gsal bas gang ba gang na yod/ de gang du bdag tsha ba dang / skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes
74a4: pa/ / lam mkhas pa lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngon chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di
74a5: nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus nas mtsho 'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing bu chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med
74a6: pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des chu thos ma
74a7: thag dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/ chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ming
74a8: nam der phyin nas/ des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral ba'i 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
74b1: stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so// mi dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs
74b2: su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so/ / lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub
74b3: sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/ chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas
74b4: so/ / yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang
74b5: gya nom pa dang / shin du zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te bsngags pa brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud cide'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom
74b6: ldan 'das ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bude lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par
74b7: bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu yang depe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig gis shing thog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa
74b8: 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te/ brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems ci mi des shing thog gi ri de sang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
75a1: 'das ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus
75a2: par rig par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin du legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
75a3: tshul 'di su dag gi nar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur
75a4: 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
75a5: sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs
75a6: pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i
75a7: stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid
75a8: kyang rab tu shes te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis med par yang mi ltung ngo //
75b1: rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
75b2: phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams
75b3: yin/ / g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i
75b4: dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
75b5: sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa'ang de 'dran de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
75b6: kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
75b7: pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam/ tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs kyi tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab
75b8: pa'i dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba'i dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog ge ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni rtag pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal
76a1: ba'am/ chang gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sa la bas gal ta zhus nas nu ba lung snyan pa'i srad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs byan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das
76a2: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig/ byang chub
76a3: sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag bstong pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsung na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad pa/
76a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin du nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan
76a5: 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems
76a6: can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag pastong pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod
76a7: ba dang / shes kyis khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsag byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
76a8: rangs pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstan pa'i skal pa yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring dpor don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
76b1: rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthum 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
76b2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshegs la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi
76b3: shes pas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de de'ang nan tan gyis sgrub bo/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams/
76b4: kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de'ang sman pa gcig pur zad de/ gnyis su med pa de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba/
76b5: nad kyis nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste/ nad la mkhas pa'o// nad
76b6: kyi gzhal mkhas pa'o/ / sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi sngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya ba shes shing yid ches par gyur nas sman ba de la rten to// de nas sman
76b7: pade sems can de dag gso zhing nad zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la bstod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
76b8: de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i zhing la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin/
77a1: yang nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang / bsngags pa
77a2: dganyid brjodade/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thob nas/ yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag
77a3: la de bzhin gshegs pa la sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar mdzad do/ / chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
77a4: lasogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyid bstod pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang
77a5: bral ba yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang /
77a6: byang chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten
77a7: thams cad du rnam par spyod do/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byams pa'i
77a8: bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin// tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtogs
77b1: ba'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnongasams
77b2: med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun du khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chu
77b3: sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs
77b4: med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub tu sems skyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/
77b5: dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byed do// de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod
77b6: sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrugs pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal ba rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed cing / sems can gyi sdug bsngal
77b7: mi zad pa/ rtsub pa/ tshab dag gis nyen kyang byang chub la phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
77b8: sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'i zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis 'khor ba'i dbyang thag yun ring po nas thogs
78a1: ba chad do zhes dga' bskyed do/ / bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa 'khor ba rgya mtshalas rgal ta nas rab tu dga' baspyad do// bdag gis yun rang ba nas bskang ba'ang rgyal gyi rgyal
78a2: mtshan pastsal lo zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do/ / bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo nas rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs byin pa yin gyis/ de na
78a3: gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do/ / bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa/ yun ring po nas gnyid log pa/ sred pa'i skams pas yongs su zin pa/ mig gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas pad pa yin gyis
78a4: dani gzhan yang sa bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ / bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang / ngan song dang / log par srung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams
78a5: cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ / bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang 'khyam zhing lam la mi mkhas la/ lam mi shes shing yul
78a6: mi shes pas lam ston bsnyed do zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do/ / bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba
78a7: laganas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcugang zhe na/ 'di ste ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su
78a8: gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mthung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du rnabs rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par
78b1: shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid
78b2: kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas
78b3: pa yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms
78b4: su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar gyur to zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
78b5: bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'ang tang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
78b6: lta ste/ shi 'bo ba'ang ston/ skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/
78b7: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bar
78b8: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
79a1: bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
79a2: bar 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba/ mi nyam pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa shi 'pho bar mthong na/ rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas
79a3: bas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas
79a4: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dod/ mi rten bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de/ dus kyang ring du yod kyis labs kyis 'dod par bya'o snyam du
79a5: sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/ bag
79a6: yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa de dag gi mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad
79a7: du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub
79a8: sems dpa' bcas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems
79b1: dpa' bcas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su sman
79b2: par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems
79b3: dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa/ de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun
79b4: ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag byang
79b5: chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag
79b6: ra rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / drags pas rlom sems pa yod de/ de dag las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul ba ston to// sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las
79b7: gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab ston te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
79b8: khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong na/ bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po
80a1: la 'bod de/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par dam bca' ba de dag gis 'byung ba dang / Sh+ya/
80a2: ma'i tshe chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
80a3: sangs rgyas paka shi'i grong rdal du song nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems
80a4: dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to// rigs kyi
80a5: bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
80a6: 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams
80a7: bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sman thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba med pa rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no//
80a8: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang tshor ba mi zad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun ring
80b1: por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyes par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar/
80b2: nade ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis byol song gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang byos song na
80b3: sdug bsngal mi zad pa spyod par 'gyur ba med do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing / de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal me zad pa brtsub par
80b4: myong bar 'gyur ba med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
80b5: sngon ldad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i shes kyi byed yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen can bram tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par
80b6: 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po ma chad pa'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing
80b7: bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing / bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas dbang po phun sumatshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba/
80b8: dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can thun pa/ rmongs pa/ lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/
81a1: bskal pa med pa/ legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis snod dum gyur pa/ mar me shes pa/ par mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'jod pa/ bram zer mi dzin
81a2: padag gi nang du mi skye'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa/ mkhas par bkur ba/ skal pa yod pa/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don
81a3: yongs su shes par byed pa'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ par shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi shes rab dang / ye shes
81a4: kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa dum 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o// byang chub
81a5: sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ni gang na
81a6: sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag du mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag
81a7: tu skye'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyob mi mnga' ba dang / dbu rgod kyi nga tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
81a8: niganas de lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/ / skyo bar 'gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
81b1: dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med de/ drang zhing sems kyi sgra
81b2: med la sems dang pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi sar tsA
81b3: dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang
81b4: zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol/ theg pa chen po la gnas/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par
81b5: 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
81b6: sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin// 'gyod
81b7: pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/
81b8: rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim 'gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod
82a1: ba yin te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang / srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub par byed do// gzhan la yang rgya cher ston to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa//
82a2: la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims
82a3: yongs su dag par phyir 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin te/ sgrib pa med pas dga' ba med pa yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par
82a4: bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa yin te/ tshe rabs
82a5: gcig kyang rjes su dran no/ / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
82a6: ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs rjes su dran pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong
82a7: ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par//
82a8: smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / gdung ba'i las dang / ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol du phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma thal
82b1: ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams
82b2: cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
82b3: sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o// lta ba
82b4: nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / chog nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'dzil dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi
82b5: gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang // khyim pa dang ston pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa
82b6: thams cad rnam par spangs pas na sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par spong ba'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par
82b7: mi bya'o/ / khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor sten te/ snyan par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal
82b8: kyis/ de bas na bdag gis bsten pa yongs su spang bar sems nye bar bzhag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
83a1: chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin no// lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/
83a2: lus rma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams
83a3: yin/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob pa rnams
83a4: yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom
83a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bus dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus mi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur
83a6: pa'i phyir ro/ / sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba dang / gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma med
83a7: pa 'thob bo/ / sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob bo// sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob bo//
83a8: sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang / thabs
83b1: mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob bo/ / sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo// sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus
83b2: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo/ / sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
83b3: rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi chos nyid tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
83b4: kyi bu lus tha dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la
83b5: yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus lus shes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i
83b6: phyir ro/ / yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du lta bar bgyi/
83b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na don gyi dbang 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na bye dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu
83b8: rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji ltar bya dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i mthu dang / yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa de ltar ni byi dor ma
84a1: byas pas ma yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub
84a2: sems dpa'i nor bu rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin pa che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang /
84a3: nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin du yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po chen de tsam du /
84a4: par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chos gnyis kyi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nya ba'i bar du zla ba yang zla ba bya ba'i grangs
84a5: su 'gro mod kyi/ chos gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla banya ba la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur
84a6: bcas te lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang der mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i drung na chos
84a7: gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi chu
84a8: chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi mtshungs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi thab
84b1: dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba byin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis
84b2: mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang pha rol po thams cad kyis mi tshugs//
84b3: pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi
84b4: tshugs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin te/ bcu
84b5: gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyin par byed pa rnams yin/ rten par bya ba rnams yin/ nye bar 'tsho bar bye ba rnams yin/ rgyags pa shin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin//
84b6: tshogs shin du bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang
84b7: chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / rgyal po chen
84b8: po'i blon po dag gis bkur ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon
85a1: chen po ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / gzhan
85a2: yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dkon par
85a3: lam grogs kyi tshogs 'chan pas bcos pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang du sems can
85a4: lam grogs kyi tshogs nyon mongs pa'i 'chan pas gtses pa legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / po ngas pa
85a5: dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nas
85a6: 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen
85a7: po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs suchas te lam grogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin
85a8: par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du
85b1: b yang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can lam grogs mang po de de de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la thams cad mkhyen pa
85b2: nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin du phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang /
85b3: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be rud+ha dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs su 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer
85b4: chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin du bsags shing 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni nor bsags pasachog mi shes pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ded
85b5: dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang po yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas
85b6: lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma log par
85b7: spabs sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
85b8: dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por
86a1: phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/ / rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam
86a2: la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam bde ba 'ang rab tu shes/ lam bde ba'ang rab tu shes/ 'tsham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang / chu med
86a3: pa yang rab tu shes/ lam gyi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so//
86a4: rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe
86a5: na/ theg pa chen po 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ston gyi nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi byang chub sems
86a6: dpa'i lam mi ston to/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mi ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
86a7: rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lamo ston gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to/ / bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam
86a8: dang / stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag gi lam mi ston to// mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston
86b1: gyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to/ / sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi lam stan gyi g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to// spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid
86b2: kye lam ston gyi byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to/ / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi 'khor ba'i lam mi ston to// lam gol bar zhugs pa'i
86b3: sems can rnams la lam srol ma ded pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam mi ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par/
86b4: ston pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin du nye bar gzhag cing
86b5: gnas so/ / tshor ba rnams dang / sems rnams dang / chos rnams dang / yul rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang /
86b6: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams
86b7: cad la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa
86b8: mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo / / de 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams te/ yar la glang ba'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go/ lus la bdag med par yang rtog go//
87a1: lus mi lartan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chu rgyus kyis glags pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / dring ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/ de da ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags pa dang / lus la
87a2: dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang
87a3: du'agyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te
87a4: tshetshor ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/ byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gyis 'phags pa rnams
87a5: kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud do snyam nas de spang ba'i phyir nan tan du byed do/ / sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtog
87a6: pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ / de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no// gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar
87a7: na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems 'di ni mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par
87a8: dga' ba'o/ / sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o// bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o// g.yo zhing mi brtan pa la myur du 'gro ba'o// nyon mod pa rnams
87b1: ngan so mas can/ / nam mongs rnams kyag nan/ bde thoms chung sanapar// 'ad chags dang / zhesang dang / gang mug rnams kyi kun du 'ang bag// chos thams
87b2: cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/ / chos thams cad kyi thog mang sems 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes nas chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bres pa ste/ sems ni sems kyis mi
87b3: mthong ste/ dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o// sems ni 'gal me lta bur 'khor/ sems ni rtaltar 'khyam pa yin/ sems ni chu chen bzhin du bskyed/ de de ltar rtog pa'i sems la dran pa gan du na par bzhag
87b4: cing gnas te/ sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro 'o// sems zhing de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems nyi de'i dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so//
87b5: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag cing gnas shes na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan dashal
87b6: 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes de/ de 'dod chags kyi gzhan po la sten/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cir de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no// chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar
87b7: shes nas chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/ chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shang gnas so// gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so//
87b8: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin du zhi bar bzhag cing gnas shes na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la chags par 'dzin par yang
88a1: ma 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni bdag byis pa dang / mongs pa dang / migasal ba dang /
88a2: mi mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro// zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs nas dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom par mi 'gyur te/ de'i chus ngan song du 'gro bar
88a3: gsungs so zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems skyed pa ni bdag gis mi cha ste/ de ni bdag gi mi bzod pa dang / dang du mi len pa dang / khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni
88a4: smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni dpya' bar 'gyur ro// zhes de de ltar rtog pas yul rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis mi smras shing mabyung bar mi 'gyur la// gzhan
88a5: yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/
88a6: de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// dgon pa la ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes
88a7: pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gis sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa deni bdag gi mi che'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la bya
88a8: pa thams cad dang bral nas tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa meng pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub
88b1: sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
88b2: gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gnas pa gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongs su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi mthun pa de dag yongs su spong ngo // de dag kyang gang
88b3: zha na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa'i byi ma 'am/ smad 'tshong gi khyim 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ brgyan po'i gnas sam/ ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/ gar mkhan dang / glu gar gyi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i
88b4: tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spong zhing / de dag la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran
88b5: pa shi na nga nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
88b6: sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ ci nas kyang zhen par mi 'gyur/ sred pa mi skyed/ chags pa mi skyed/ bdag gir mi byed/ nor du mi 'dzin pa dang /
88b7: bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/ gal te de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs
88b8: bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal mi skye/ rgyags pa mi skye ste/ de 'di snyam du sems so// ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang / gang gis phrub
89a1: ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang med par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba
89a2: dag la dga' ba'i sems skyes pa'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa
89a3: rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
