111b2: ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// dbang po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang
111b3: po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su byang ba rnams yin// gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ thab dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang
111b4: bral ba rnams yin/ khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhis khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
111b5: par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa
111b6: rnams dang bral bas na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin
111b7: 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs la rnams dang bral ba na khro gnyer med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni 'dod chags
111b8: kyi mas rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / zhe sdang gi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o// zhes yang
112a1: dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / 'du byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 2dzi
112a2: rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji
112a3: lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das bzhi zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de yang
112a4: thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pas shes kyi sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson
112a5: 'grus rtsom mo/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa rnams yin/
112a6: bcu gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ phyi ma'i dus phye ma'i cha lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cing bstan pa la khrugs par gyur pa dang / sems can rnams la mngon par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi sgro ma mya ngan
112a7: las 'das te/ ston pa med pa'i tshe/ med rgya chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la rjod cing ston la yang
112a8: dag par ston cing gsal bar byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa
112b1: dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa dang / rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i
112b2: chom yongs su tshol ba dang / btsal nas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi cos bcud ngasanan byung
112b3: sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa rnams yin/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
112b4: dang ldan zhing shin du yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su rten pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin
112b5: de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i gnas khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyob pa rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul la shin du slabs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas
112b6: rnams la shin tu mthar phyin pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos
112b7: kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub las phyir mi ldog
112b8: pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi skul ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin// chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
113a1: khong du chud pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi ring mi 'jog pa rnams yin// shin tu rtag pa'i lags dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan nas dang / rang sangs pas thams dang ldan mngam pa
113a2: brnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs
113a3: pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pas bsu pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no// cu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam
113a4: bcan yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so/ / zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dma' ba'i bsam pa can dang / bar ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhen pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i
113a5: bsam pa can dang / brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yan ring po'i bsam pa can dang / sems can gtum pa'i bsam pa can dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing de yang sems can gcig la ji ltar
113a6: shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / bag la nyal shes pa rnams
113a7: yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i chog shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i
113a8: sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis
113b1: 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs can thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan zas kyigazugs/ brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ba
113b2: byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs/ tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba
113b3: sems can rnams la bram ze'i gzugs/ / rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khyim bdag gi gzugs
113b4: nye bar bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
113b5: sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i chos shes pa rnams yidano/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dra ba rnams yin// 'jam pa
113b6: rnams yin/ gya gru med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin// gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/
113b7: mi brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnams yin// des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' da
113b8: pa rnams yino/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun//
114a1: sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ kho yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs
114a2: pamatshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa rnams yin/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams yin// la ma gcag tu zhugs pa rnams yin// ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
114a3: dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams
114a4: sdang ngo / / bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan pa smra ba dang / don du smra ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing gis don 'thun pa dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad kyis don
114a5: 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ / rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa na gang chos sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i sbyin pa na gang zang zeng sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o// phan par smra ba ni
114a6: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa'o/ / don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// cho su smra ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par chos ston pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi
114a7: 'ason pa'o/ / don thub ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bsrangs de dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o// zang zing gis don mthun pa ni gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba dang / gzhib pa dang
114a8: lasags pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa ni gang gsar dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbra ma dang / dngul dang /
114b1: tadang / glang pa che dang / shaben dang / bzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dadag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu pa'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
114b2: byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no/ / bcug zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod lam rab tu zhipa rnams yin// spyod lam snga med pa rnams yin// spyod lam yongasu dag pa rnams yin/ khaltan dga' ba rnams
114b3: yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ blta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin// bltan sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ bltan sems can thams cad sems
114b4: tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
114b5: bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su spang ba rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dam
114b6: pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/ / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin// mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nang par gyur pa rnams la ldan sa nus las di rte me dag da pa
114b7: da la'i/ / nas me ga sa gnas pa rdzas yin/ skabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin// gling med pa dgal gling rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
114b8: byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de
115a1: na rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po lhan bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsabs kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o/ / sdong po dang / yal ga rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang mdzang
115a2: ba dang / bsnams pa dang / myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nang par gyur pa'i
115a3: sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas
115a4: pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po lta bu rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba
115a5: la brtson pa rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnam sa la rtsi sbyin pa dang / sems can bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi
115a6: sbyin pa dang / drung dang lhags pa dang nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dgab pa sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par
115a7: sgra phyag 'tshal/ ldang thal mo sbyar shing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lagabang dang / bskyed mos tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba gtod pa dang / bran pho dang / na
115a8: mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo ba shas yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
115b1: sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stsal pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang
115b2: migayo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dra'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan
115b3: to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
115b4: byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gror byed/ bkur sti byed/ ste sta dbyed/ mchod pa byed do// sangs
115b5: rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
115b6: rgya bar yang snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du marar yang yongs su mya
115b7: ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ji snyed pa la de snyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed kyang de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/ rtog pa med cing
115b8: rnam par rtog pa med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na me rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags//
116a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpa nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhir snang bar byed cing sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kya gnyis
116a2: dang zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o/ / bdag cag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du byed pas zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyis bya ba de lta bu 'byung /
116a3: ngo rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed pa mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ bsgrim pa'am/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya
116a4: ba rnams la mngon par grub pa'i phyir te/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba da lta de ltar smon lam
116a5: ga de lta de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du
116a6: blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub sa sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// tshul khrims shin du
116a7: grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'phags pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khrims shin/
116a8: drakun su mtshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod bzhin du ldan su tshogs pa rnams dang / rtson 'grus shin du phun su mtshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phran su mtshogs pa rnams dang / shes rab shan
116b1: phun kur tshogs pa rnams dang / thabs shin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin du phun sum tshogs rnam ma dang / ye shes shin du grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i
116b2: ye shes nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan changs dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas pa
116b3: shes shin du rdzogs pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
116b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
116b5: khams 'di ni ri rab ri'i rgyal po dag gam/ ri btang bzung ngam/ ri btang bzung chen po dag gam/ khor yug gi ri'am/ khor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/ de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang
116b6: yul ga ya gangan pa dang / g.ya mgo'i re gang na ba de logs su bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par 'gyur to// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni me tog gi shing ngang/
116b7: 'bras bu'i shing ngam spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir g.ya mgo' ra gang na ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
116b8: la chos kyi dgab 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang / rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po rab tsam byas par gyur to// rgya bon dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma yang
117a1: mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyang ba byas te 'dud cing / bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu brgya stong dum yang nam mkha'i dbyings la
117a2: gnas te/ gos g.yo ba cing ca co dang / gzhi brgya stong du ma byed par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing / kye ma'i deng ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par
117a3: gyur te/ kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to// sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
117a4: pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa yin na/ / gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes de skad ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod/ lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid
117a5: la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'brug ltar sgra'u ru ru 'byin/ / sgrogs par byed shin du sgrogs par byed cing / spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / g.ya mgo
117a6: ril spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo / / klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur to// dri za dang mi 'am ci brgya stong du sa
117a7: yang snyan cing zab pa'i dbyangs kyis klu len cing ga ya mgo'i ri dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la bskor ba byed par gyur to// gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang pad ma'i char
117a8: mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/ / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma yang me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
117b1: dang rgyal mtshan dang kha dan dgagis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir so so'i rkyen mtshams
117b2: kyi mdzad sunas 'ad zer mang po brtse bar 'gyur te/ 'od zer dadag kyang kha dag snga chags// gzugs sna tshogs/ snang ba sdu chags can sha stags// 'dal sa// smon pa dang / ser pa dang / dmar po dag/ dgang bang /
117b3: lab rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi khadog ste/ de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la bskor ba byed cing mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te/ 'khor nas ga ya maka'i rol bskor
117b4: babyas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon par
117b5: 'du bya ba 'di ni blang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig bdun bcu ma gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang chos rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang /
117b6: bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngon chad ma bskyed pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas g.ya mgo'i ril gnas pa'i lha mo ma'i che bzhes
117b7: bya ba dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las de stan las langs nas bdag gis gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/ phyir bcom
117b8: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas// btsun par byas/ ri mor byas// mchod pa byas/ sti stang byas/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang / btsun pa dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa dang /
118a1: sti stang dang / rim gro byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshor rabs gzhan de dang de dag la g.ya mgo'i ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun
118a2: bcu rtsa gnyis kyis don 'di nyid dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog
118a3: 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ / de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
118a4: de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang / 'di bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de
118a5: dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la/ de bzhin
118a6: gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni rkyen
118a7: to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi'i'achi ba ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis me khyab pa la gnas pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi bas gang yang dag par len du btsud pa dang / gzed bstod pa
118a8: dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs
118b1: kyi bu lnga po mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'a
118b2: ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal ba/ mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston
118b3: cig/ de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su snyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
118b4: par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing bai dUr+ya'i gzhir snang bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing shing tha mal ba mdal/ gnas gnas
118b5: dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to/ / gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba dag sdang bar gyur to// mi
118b6: phal ba med par snang bar gyur to/ / de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur te/ pad ma de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i
118b7: gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
118b8: chos ston par snang ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du bdar te/ 'di lta
119a1: chos nyid 'di kho na brtsams nas chos ston par snang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas
119a2: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam
119a3: grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par
119a4: 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa
119a5: lkug par byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris/ legs par zhus te sems dad pas sems can
119a6: da pa la byin na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor
119a7: ba nas 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/ 'jig rten pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi
119a8: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog
119b1: gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi bu gang la la
119b2: shig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas
119b3: kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
119b4: chos 'di nyid la brten na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos 'di nyid brten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos 'di nyid la brten na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
119b5: 'jig rten du 'phyang bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad gzung ba dang / blags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas par
119b6: 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
119b7: 'dul ba'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ pus po g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
119b8: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di thob pas skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das
120a1: kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dgas phyogs
120a2: kang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa dang / ston pa'i sa phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o// mchod rten chen por bzung bar bya'o// bdag cag gi stan/
120a3: pa gnas 'di na bzhugs sa par gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid 'di ni byang chub po// chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa
120a4: ni chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de gnas pa de la yang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la yang
120a5: bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang / dang ba dang // rangs pa bskyed par bya'o// rim
120a6: gror byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o/ / chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa
120a7: brjod kyang / chos smra ba de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya ba dang / btsun par bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod pa ni gyi na cung zad du zad do// rigs//
120a8: kyi bu dag gal te chos 'di 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam bdag gi khrag gis chag chag byas nas kyang chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir
120b1: zhe na rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba'i 'di na dka' ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i tshe
120b2: 'jigs pa'i med par bya'o/ / bzhum pa dang / su ma god pa dang / zhem 'gras pa'i sems dang / gos gtsang ma bgos te dang ba bskyed par bya'o// bdag gi bsngags pa brjod kyang mi stebs pa dang / nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya
120b3: ste/ bdag mi bstod/ gzhan mi smod cing / des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
120b4: dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am/ bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag dpung dang bcas
120b5: 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kau shi ka legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// de nas
120b6: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
120b7: rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog sprin ces bya bar zung shig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ sgrub
120b8: thams cad rnam par sel bas kun dris pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba yid dga' zhing / byang
121a1: chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa dang / lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang /
121a2: dem yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//
121a3: 'phags pa dkon mchog smin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mtsho dang / chos nyid tshul khrims kyis skur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
121a4: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+han nAm ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po nas bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang gi/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems la/ 'phags pa nyan thos
121a5: dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po 'khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas brtan 'od bsrung chen po la sogs pa dge slongs
121a6: la phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// sems shin tu rnam
121a7: par grol ba/ / shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khung bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yo
121a8: sazad pa/ tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa// mkhas pa mngon par shes pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la
121b1: bsam gtan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum po de dag phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung
121b2: nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
121b3: de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de phyogs gcig du 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i la sogs pa dge slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum yang phye ma nged kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas/
121b4: na bung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la de
121b5: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe sprin chen snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo chen po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
121b6: chen po sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen srung zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen glog gi 'od ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems
121b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen 'brug bsgrags dbyangs shes bya ba dang / sprin chen brtson 'grus srung zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dga' byed can zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rab dga' zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen bags/
121b8: zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen nges par sgra srog shes bya ba dang / sprin chen grags shes bya ba dang / sprin chen glog gi 'od kyi dra ba can zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen klog sbyin zhes bya ba dang
122a1: sprin chen dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rtsal gyis 'gro zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen seng ge sgra sgrogs rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen tshwa rgyas blo gros shes bya ba dang / sprin chen brtson 'grus
122a2: lo zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen lta ba'i dus tshed rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang / sman chen yang dag par
122a3: lha zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen mu stegs su gyur pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / sprin chen bsod nams zhing zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen bsil bar gyur ces bya ba dang / sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen
122a4: zla ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba dang / sprin chen rin thang med pa'i bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rtag tu lta ba zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rtag pa'i rang bzhin la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang //
122a5: sprin chen rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen 'od rgyas shes bya ba dang / sprin chen rnam par rgyal ba'i klus byin zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dga' bas 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen ded dpon mig
122a6: ces bya ba dang / sprin chen cod pan gyis spangs skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen ston par gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen sa bon bsrung zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rnam par rgyal bar pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen
122a7: me lta bu'i ye shes kyi pad ma zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen stobs bsgos pa'i ud pa la'i dri ldan zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen stag ces bya ba dang / sprin chen 'dren spyod ces bya ba dang / sprin chen mi 'jigs sgra zhwa bya ba dang / sprin chen
122a8: tam la'i lo ma bsil ba zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen rin chen tsan dan bsil ba'i lus zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dam pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen ya mtshan la mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dga' ba sred med kyi bu zhes
122b1: byab dang / sprin chen snyan dngags mkhan gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba dang / sprin chen snying po phra ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dam pa'i chos mchog pad ma dkar po rgyas pa'i gdong zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dam pa'i gdong zhes
122b2: bya ba dang / sprin chen dam pa'i chos kyi rgyun rtogs zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen grags pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen sman kun sbyir zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen sman pa'i rgyal
122b3: po zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen lus chen zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen mkha' la mngon par 'phags shes bya ba dang / sprin chen sgra ldan zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen dri ma sel ces bya ba dang / sprin chen sgron ma pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba
122b4: dang / sprin chen rnam par sgrogs pa len pa med pa'i rtog pa ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / sprin chen mun sel ces bya ba dang / sprin chen rim pa'i thog tog sel ba zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya
122b5: phrag drug dang / brgyad 'bum yang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
122b6: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe seng ge sgron ma la sogs pa'i li tsi byi gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang brgyad 'bum
122b7: la 'di lta ste/ li tsi byi gzhon nu chos byin zhes bya ba dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu klu mgo zhes bya ba dang / lir tsa byi gzhon nu chos sde zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu dbang pos byin zhes bya ba dang / lang tsa byi gzhon nu dbang po'i
122b8: tog ces bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan 'od ces bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu seng ge'i sgra sgrogs blo gros shes bya ba dang / li tse byi gzhon nu rin chen mgrin dbyangs shes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu
123a1: pas byed dpa la zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu klu dpal zhes bya ba dang / ling na byi gzhon nu rdo rje phreng ldan zhes bya ba dang / lin byigazhon nusangs rgyas 'bangs shes bya ba dang / ling na byi gzhon nu rgyal ba'i 'bangs shes
123a2: bya ba dang / ling ma byi gzhon nu rgyal ba'i grwa ba zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byig non nu lag chen zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byig non nu dpal chen zhes bya ba dang / letso byigazhon nu gangags byin zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu 'jam pal
123a3: snying po zhes bya ba dang / ling cag zhon nu klu dga' stobs shes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu klu skyong zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / lid tsa byi gzhon nu 'od grags shes bya ba dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu nam
123a4: mkha'i mdzod ces bya dang / ris kyi gzhon nu gang gAs skyong zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu srin phyis kyis rna cha gdub 'khor can zhes bya ba dang / ling tsha byi gzhon nu glog phreng can zhes bya ba dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu rnam par dga'
123a5: zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu khyad par can gyi rigs shes bya ba dang / lid tsa byi gzhon nu dri med 'od grags shes bya ba dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu gling bu can gyis byin zhes bya ba dang / ling tsa byi gzhon nu sa'i dbang phyug ces
123a6: bya ba dang / lir tsa byi gzhon nus steng phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu mtshungs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i bran zhes bya ba dang / re dag la sogs pa li tsa byi gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang brgyad 'bum ste/ lir tsi byi zhon
123a7: cu da dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po la sems rab tu dga' ba sha stag ste/ phye mad kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das
123a8: ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal ma sbyar ba btud de phyogs
123b1: gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba dri za'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu sa ya phrag bzhi dang bzhi 'bum la 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba'i dri za'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' zhing dang ba'i
123b2: thags pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu zla ba'i gtsug phung can zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu rna 'phyang rna chag du bkor can zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu rangs byed kyi rol mo sa 'dzin ces bya ba dang / lha'i
123b3: bu dpal chen zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu zab mo tshul chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nag po chen po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dpa' ba'i blo gros shes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nam mkha' ltar mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang //
123b4: lha'i bu dga' ba la rnam par mos pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' phreng rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' bar grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu bzhin dga' zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu yid 'phrog ces bya//
123b5: ba dang / lha'i bu bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu bai dUr+ya ltar 'od snang ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu 'phral ba zla gam ltar 'dug pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nges par sgra sgrogs
123b6: zab mo zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu brgya byin dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu man dA ra ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i
123b7: bu mgo la 'khri shing thogs pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu bur ma sel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dam pa'i chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu sa ya phrag bzhi dang bzhi 'bum ste/ lha'i bu de dag
123b8: thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la sems dang cing rab tu dga' ba/ dam pa'i chos bsrung bar dga' ba/ dam pa'i chos rgyas par dga' ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzung bar dga' ba sha stag ste/ sems can rnams la
124a1: phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
124a2: la lan stong bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste klu'i rgyal po pad ma
124a3: zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po stabs kyi rgyu zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ba
124a4: dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'byor gnas shes bya dang / klu'i rgyal po byis pa rtsa zhes bya ba dang klu'i rgyal po mche ba mchog tu rno zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po mang khyer zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po'i yan lag 'char ri dgas
124a5: mig ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po phur bu sgra rig zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po gser mdog gdong zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po stang zil gtsug bud ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chu'i shugs 'dzin ces bya ba dang /
124a6: klu'i rgyal po ti se'i gangs thub ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po byi ru bzang zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po phre sba snyan ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po lug gdong zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas spogs mkhas sha
124a7: bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum ste/ klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg
124a8: chen po thos par 'dod pa/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la rgyas par ston par 'dod pa/ dam pa'i chos 'chad par 'dod pa/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can dam pa'i chos
124b1: bsrung ba'i khur khyer ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe dang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos
124b2: thag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la la na gsum bskar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba da lags su thal mo sbyar ba brgyad de phyogs gcig tu 'kha dang // yang de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos
124b3: gyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa ya brag gsum dang drug 'bum la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mal 'bod ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi
124b4: rgyal po ma 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ma la dpal du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag sgeg ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / gnod
124b5: sbyin gyi rgyal po khro gnyer mig zur can zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa sbrul zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyi ma rangs byad zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po shes ldan dang tshul can zhes bya
124b6: pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor bu bzang zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 'od chags pad ma mdzod ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po shing rta gtong ba'i pad ma'i snying po dpal zhes bya ba dang / gnod
124b7: sbyin gyi rgyal po shes thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba'i g.yul gyi dpal zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rjen zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor bu spyod ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi
124b8: rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang / drug 'bum ste/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob par 'dod pa/ dam pa'i chos
125a1: bsrung ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can sha stag ste/ bye ma radang kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bas
125a2: phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal pos ya
125a3: phrag bzhi dang dgu 'bum la 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che rlung gi stobs dang mnyam pa'i shugs can zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'ur 'ur zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding
125a4: gi rgyal po rnga bo che cang te'u yi sgra ltar dir di rare zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po klu'i stobs dang dregs pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sang sang zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' ldang
125a5: girgyal po 'od chen zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gshog zegs bkram zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bung rgyal gdong zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rig sngags kyi nor bu'i
125a6: sil sil 'chang zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i rigs gzhig par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i rigs rab tu 'doms par dga' ba zhes bya ba
125a7: dang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po yang dag par mthong ba zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po byams pa chen po'i tshig snyan par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding ga rgyal po ches dga' zhes bya ba
125a8: dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser gyi gshog pa sbyin zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sa ya phrag bzhi dang dgu 'bum ste/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs
125b1: ba dang / ngargyal dang / rgyags pa dang bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la dang pa'i sems thob pa/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal
125b2: bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ dri za'i rgyal po dga'
125b3: ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po gang das snyan ces bya ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po sta gon la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po khyu mchog lha zhes bya ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po shugs kyis 'khyig par len pa
125b4: la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po shang shad te'u yi skad 'byin ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum ste/ dri za'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs pa dang / nga rgyal
125b5: dang / rgyags pa dang bral ba// theg pa chen po la dad pa'i sems thob pa/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe dang dang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
125b6: ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po chen
125b7: po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po legs mthong yid 'phrog ces bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po klu khyer zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bud med sems 'phrog ces
125b8: bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bud med kyi snying du sdug pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'o rgyal po lha'i bu mo la 'bod pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po nyon mongs pa rku ba zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal
126a1: po dgra rig dregs 'joms gsod ces bya ba dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po bdud kyi bu mo dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bdud kyi sde 'joms shes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ye shes snying po
126a2: zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po zab mo'i tshul bsgos shes bya ba dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dbang po bsrungs shes bya ba dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po/
126a3: rgyang ring mthong zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum ste/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang 'bral ba/ theg
126a4: pa chen po la dad pa'i sems thob pa/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
126a5: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe srin po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba dang / srin
126a6: po'i rgyal po rtsib ma sreg ces bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po drang srong zas len skra ser zhes bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po so rang rod can zhes bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po rna bcas thod pa can zhes bya ba dang / srin
126a7: po'i rgyal po ser po sbrang rtsi'i mdog ces bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po mgul ngar shes bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po skra bo che zhes bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po mgo zer ces bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po
126a8: gyad la skul zhes bya ba dang / srin po'i rgyal po skrag byed gzugs can zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po sa ya dang brgyad 'bum ste/ srin po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang srin
126b1: po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ / theg pa chen pos sems dul bar gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/ phye ma re kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde/
126b2: dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang brgyad 'bram la 'di lta ste/ grul bum gyi rgya
126b3: po glang po che'i rna ba can zhes bya ba dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po stag ltar dregs pa zhes bya ba dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po shin du che ba zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang /
126b4: brgyad 'bum ste/ grul bum gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang grul bum gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom
126b5: ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/
126b6: 'byung po'i rgyal po glang po che'i gdod can zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po myu gu zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po khyim 'bigs rkun po zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po bod skad can zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i
126b7: rgyal po me tog gi rna cha can zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po sbal phreng sor rngub can zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po byi so mdzes shes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po byi la 'gros mdzes shes bya ba dang / 'byung
126b8: po'i rgyal po sre mo 'gram zhes bya ba dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po smre bzhin zla ba gdong zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang brgyad 'bum ste/ 'byung po'i rgyal po de dag thams
127a1: cad kyang theg pa chen po la sems dad cing rab tu dga' ba sha stag ste/ gar byed cang ral ma'i sgra sngags la sel snyan rnams rdob cing phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
127a2: ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste/ gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po
127a3: glog zhi byed btsun zhes bya ba dang / gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sna tshogs sde btsun zhes bya ba dang / gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po byam chu can zhes bya ba dang / gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khrug byed ces bya ba dang / de dag
127a4: la sogs pa gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad de/ gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon par rtse ba/ theg pa chen po la sems mngon par rab tu dga' ba/ theg pa chen
127a5: po mngon par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen pos mngon par skom pa/ theg pa chen po la mngon par sred pa/ theg pa chen po la dad pa// theg pa chen pos bkres pa/ dam mo/ nardza mas das ngas ku dkrung yongs su dzin did
127a6: tshul can sha stag ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod dedo//
127a7: yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po bye ba phrag brgyad dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyi mdun na sgra sgrogs shes bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po yul gyis g.yon spyo ba zhes
127a8: bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gang gA dri ma med par 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sa steng zhi byed ces bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po bya mgrin ces bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po mdung rtse
127b1: gsum pa'achang nas bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thal ba'i gtsug pud can zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtum po drag tu khra ba zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ma'i gzi brjid kyi shugs can zhes bya
127b2: ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lA ma yin gyi rgyal pos ya phrag brgyad dang brgyad 'bum ste/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang lha ma yin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sems dul ba/ yad rab tu brtan pa sha stag
127b3: ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dor ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rigs
127b4: sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum la 'di lta ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rin chen 'chang zhes bya ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po longs spyod mi zad 'chang zhes bya ba dang / de
127b5: dag la sogs pa'i rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum te/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshol bar
127b6: 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa/ bdag gi yid gnyis bsal bar 'dod pa/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs can sha stag ste/
127b7: bye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe drang sro
127b8: mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/ sa ya phrag dgu dang dgu 'bum la 'di lta ste/ drang srong mis byin gyi ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong te ma bu ka zhes bya ba dang // drang srong shing shun can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong dga' thub
128a1: can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba dang / drang srong kun du rgyal zhes bya ba dang / drang srong ngan spong shes ldan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong ri byi rengs byed gzhu can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong ma ma re
128a2: dgas shes bya ba dang / drang srong sha med zas sbyin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong gnas 'jog sel brtson zhes bya ba dang / drang srong sgra mi snyan lnga len ril ba can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong 'dod pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa zhes bya
128a3: ba dang / drang srong dus dang po la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong brgya byin lhar 'dzin yun ring gnas shes bya ba dang / drang srong mdzod ldan sgra mi snyan ces bya ba dang / drang srong b+ha ra dang shing shun can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
128a4: klu'i ril pa can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong 'dam bus byin zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa sa ya phrag dgu dang dgu 'bum ste/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas
128a5: byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
128a6: btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom
128a7: ldan 'das ga la ba der dang ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu la bod do// yang de'i tshe
128a8: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas mdun gyis bltas te yongs su bskor nas phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
128b1: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe yul mnyan yod na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi blon po chen po theg pa chen po la mngon par rtsa ba de dang de dag rang rang gi 'khor dang
128b2: dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa dag dang ldan cig tu phye ma rad kyi dus kyi tsha rang rang gi gnas nas zung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal 'a der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
128b3: 'khod do/ / yang de'i tsher ba sbyin la sogs pa khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ de dag thams cad chos 'dod pa dang // chos don du gnyer ba dang / 'di
128b4: ltar byang chub kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba de dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs cig tu
128b5: 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe yul pan tsa nas rgyal phran zla ba skyong zhes bya ba rang gi blon po chen po dang / grong khyer gyi dpon po stong bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
128b6: dag par zhugs pa/ de dag thams cad chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'bra
128b7: bde dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe yul chen po bcu drug gi grong khyer dang / tshong rdal dang / lung ba'i mdodang / grong dang / yul
128b8: 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya'i phyir lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos kun tu srung ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa bla na
129a1: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir bcom
129a2: ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba/ byams pa'i sems sgom pa de dag phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
129a3: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe btsun mo phreng ldan ma la sogs pa chun ma'i 'khor dang / btsun mo khri drug song dang / gzhan yang rang gi blon po chen po'i btsun mo 'bum dang ldan
129a4: cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe dge
129a5: bsnyen ma sa ga dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phyem rad kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
129a6: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul dang snang ba chen po dang ldan pa 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus
129a7: kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ me tog
129a8: gi phur ma ri rab tsam dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas bdug pa dag gis yongs su bdugs te/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis yongs su gtor nas
129b1: sil snyan dag brdungs te/ gzhan yang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyis pad ma'i silam dag gis khebs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal ma sbyar ba btung te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe
129b2: tshangs pa rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhes bya ba dang / tshangs pa thor tshugs 'chang zhes bya ba dang / tshangs pa gzhon nu 'bum phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu rdzu 'phrul chen pos rgyal po'i khab dang bcas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
129b3: dang bcas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa dang bcas pa thams cad mdzes par byas te/ phye ma rad kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
129b4: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ khor yug khebs pa tsam gyi me tog sil ma dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor te/ sil snyan rnams brdungs nas/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / brug pa dag gis/
129b5: gtor te/ rgyal po'i khab dang bcas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i r-i dang bcas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dang bcas pa/ bsod nams chen po'i zhing du gyur pa dkyil 'khor chen po mu stegs gi gnas su gyur
129b6: gakor lolor yug tul ba dang / ras dang / za ba dar dang / zar ma'i ras 'jam po dang / lha'i gos lha'i phye mas bsgos shing tsan dan gyis zhen par byas nas lha'i bdug pas bdugs pa dag bting ste/ mngon par sprul pa
129b7: bzhin du byas nas me tog gi char mngon par phab nas lha'i bu rin po che du mas yongs su mdzes par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'bum bshams te/ lan sa ya phrag gsum bskor ba byas nas rang rang
129b8: gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo mngon par sdud pa zhes bya ba/
130a1: bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tsher dngang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ rnga yab dang / rma bya'i mdongs la ga na thogs shing
130a2: lha'i phag dang / gling bu dang / bdug pa thogs te/ lha'i me tog sil mas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas sil snyan rnams rdungs te gar byed cing glu len no// lha mo de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po
130a3: la sems dang cing rab tu dga' ba/ / theg pa chen po la dad cing yid dge bar gyur pa sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs
130a4: gcig tu 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo chu shing lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
130a5: lha'i gser gyi tshang tsong dang / lha'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang / lha'i me tog gi phreng ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor te sil snyan rnams rdungs nas tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dag gis kyang
130a6: gtor to/ / lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi sems kyi g.yo sgyu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ theg pa chen po la sems dang cing rab tu dga' ba/ theg pa chen po la dad cing yid dge bar gyur pa sha stag ste/
130a7: glu len cing gar byed la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
130a8: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs dag na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der 'dong
130b1: par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan//
130b2: 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe nam mkha' las sil stan stong gi glu dbyangs lta bu 'thun pa dang /
130b3: mi 'thun pa'i sgra mngon par grag ste/ stang zil gyi ri lta bur 'dug pa'i sprin chen po'i chags lha'i rin po che'i chus yongs su rgyas pa dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs shing chos ston pa
130b4: mnod pa'i phyir bstod do/ / yang de'i tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po rnam par 'thor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po
130b5: chen po shugs mnyams pa zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba rnams lha'i bde ba'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa'i dus tshogs drug gi bde zhing bsil ba'i me tog dang rnam par
130b6: 'dres pa'i dri bsung zhim po'i ngang gtong zhing / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir sprin chen po rab tu 'gyed de/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs shing chos ston pa
130b7: mnod pa'i phyir bstod do/ / 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo// bam po gnyis pa// yang de'i tshe dang pa'i rgyal po seng ge ltar dpa' ba zhes bya ba dang ba 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red
130b8: kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi 'dab ma thal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ slob
131a1: dpon dang slob mas legs pas bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan stong gi glu dbyangs lta bur skar 'thun papa byin cing / ngang ba'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan
131a2: gsum bskor ba byas nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe rma bya'i rgyal po bltan 'od chags zhes bya ba rma bya'i rigs 'bum phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu
131a3: phye ma red kyi dus kyi tsher darang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi 'dab ma thal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
131a4: lha dang / dri za'i slob dpon dang slob mas legs par bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan stong gi glu dbyangs lta bur mgrin pa bstabs te skad snyan cing 'thun pa 'byin te/ rma bya'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i
131a5: phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde bdag ces bya ba khu byug gi rgyal po 'bum
131a6: phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe dang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi mdab mthal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo/
131a7: bos phyag 'tshal nas sil snyan sto dang 'dra ba'i sgra phyung ste ca co'i sgra bton nas/ bung ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i khu byug gi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
131a8: bskor ba byas nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go gzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ril gnas pa'i bya ka la bing ka'i rgyal po pad ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i mig ces bya ba ka la
131b1: bing ka'i rgyal po 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi mdab ma thal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom
131b2: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yid du'ang ba'i sgra phyung ste/ ka la bad ka'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sr-i 'u bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'od mal
131b3: tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe bya'i rgyal po shang shar te'u zhes bya ba bya'i rgyal po shang shar te'u 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe dang rang gi gnas
131b4: nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi mdab ma thal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste/ shang shar
131b5: te'u yi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe bya'i tshogs
131b6: thams cad bya ma nged kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi mdab ma thal mo'i thabs su sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
131b7: phyag 'tshal nas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'bum phrag du ma phyung ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su gang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te
131b8: 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi lha/ ri btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po'i lha 'bum phrag du ma dang / lha'i bu 'od chen dang lhan
132a1: gcig tu phye mnged kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag pas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu
132a2: bskor nga byas nas/ 'od ma'i 'tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu gzung ngo // yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ril gnas pa'i sman gyi tshogs kyi lha mo rnams phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/
132a3: bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste skyugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de'i mchog bya god kyi phung po la mdzes par 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal ma snang
132a4: btud de/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri dang bcas pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / cang te'u dang / dung dang / lcags kyi sil krol dang / hin Di ma dang / khar tra dang /
132a5: dzachen po dang / bal bis dang / bi bar dang / rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang / dril bu dang / gling bu dang / shu ka dang / kun la 'gogs pa ma brdungs/ ma bcos ma blangs par sil snyan gyi sgra dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung ngo // yang de'i tshe bcom
132a6: ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nags rnams dus ma yin par me tog rgyas shing dus ma yin par 'bras bu dang / lcug bran dang / dog pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la shin tu bkram mo// yang de'i tshe
132a7: gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i seng ge'i rgyal po rin chen pad ma zhes bya ba seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
132a8: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gcan zan dang ri dgas thams cad la bde ba'i sgra seng ge'i skad 'byin cing 'chag la shin tu rtse ste/ bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das/
132b1: lalan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo // yang de'i rgya smos kyi glang po'i rgyal po rab dang sprin lta bu zhes bya ba dang / spos kyi glang po'i rgyal ba 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan mi/
132b2: tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'brug sde chen po bzhin du sgrogs shing skad byung nas/ bcom
132b3: ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i phyogs gcig tu go gzung ngo / / de bzhin du gcan zan dang ri dgas thams cad kyi bar dag gis bya rgod phung po'i
132b4: ri'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo / / yang de'i tshe sha s+phar dang / sbrang bu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / sdig pa dang / srin gyi med dang / ba ra su me ka dang / tsun tsu ka dang / sa ri ka dang / srog chags gdug pa'i rigs
132b5: rnams kyis dug rnam par spangs nas dug gi rang bzhin dang bral bar gyur te 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / myur du gdug pa dang / sbrul gzi gu dang / chu sbrul dang / gdug pa'i mi zad pa chen po'i rigs rnams kyis
132b6: dug rnam par spangs nas drug gi rang bzhin dang bral bar gyur te 'khod do/ / yang de'i tshe nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis thebs pa'i sems can gang su'ang rung ba dag dang / yi dgas su gyur pa gang yin pa dag dang / sems can dmyal
132b7: ba'i skye gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad zas dang skom gyis tshim par gyur te/ bde ba dang bsil ba'i rlung gis phog nas gnyid 'ong zhing mngon par rtse bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe las mi zad pa rnam pa bcu /
132b8: gis 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams kyis las mi zad pa'i rang bzhin btang nas de dag thams cad kyang zas dang skom gyis tshim par gyur te/ bde ba dang sel ba'i rlung gis phog nas/ gnyid 'ong zhing mngon par rtse bar
133a1: gyur te/ sha za zhing srin po'i rang bzhin lta bur gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang sha za ba spangs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshul khrims blangs so// yang de'i tshe sems can gang dag byi bo byed
133a2: padang / rku 'phrog la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshul khrims blangs te dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar gyur to// de nas las mi zad pa chen po bcu drug gis 'tshe ba dang / sha za ba dang /
133a3: byi bo byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa la zhugs pa'i sems can de dag gis rang rang gi sems rjes su dran nas gar byed cing glu len te/ sri zhu bya bar brtsams so// yang de'i tshe de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang /
133a4: gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / 'byung po dang / gcod byed kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / tshangs pa
133a5: dang / nags kyi lha dang / bya dang rig sngags 'chang dang / 'dod dgur sgyur bar gzugs can gyi lha mo'i tshogs du ma dag kyang chos kyi 'du ston gyi mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po thos ste rab tu dga' bar gyur nas tshul
133a6: khrims yongs su dag cing theg pa chen po rgyas par bya bar 'dod pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo chen po'i bsgrub pa bzung bar 'dod pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams yun ring du gnas par
133a7: 'dod pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rgya chen po skyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos gnas par 'dod pa rnams phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom
133a8: ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'du ston la mchod pa byas te/ mtshan mtha' yas pas yang dag par brgyan pa/ ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya ba lta bu'i rgyal ba'i zla ba'i zhabs
133b1: lamago bos yun ring du phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems
133b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
133b3: nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs gangashi tshe// de skad ces gsol nas/ bco
133b4: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sprin chen snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan
133b5: pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
